trans-unit.source: Creating timers using erlang:send_after/3 and erlang:start_timer/3 , is much more efficient than using the timers provided by the timer module in STDLIB. The timer module uses a separate process to manage the timers. That process can easily become overloaded if many processes create and cancel timers frequently (especially when using the SMP emulator).
trans-unit.target: 使用 erlang:send_after/3 和 erlang:start_timer/3 创建计时器比使用STDLIB中的 timer 模块提供的计时器效率更高。所述 timer 模块使用一个单独的进程来管理定时器。如果许多进程频繁创建和取消计时器（特别是在使用SMP仿真器时），则该进程很容易变得过载。

trans-unit.source: Data in Mnesia is organized as a set of tables. Each table has a name that must be an atom. Each table is made up of Erlang records. The user is responsible for the record definitions. Each table also has a set of properties. The following are some of the properties that are associated with each table:
trans-unit.target: Mnesia中的数据被组织成一组表格。每个表都有一个名称,必须是一个原子。每个表由Erlang记录组成。用户负责记录的定义。每个表也有一组属性。以下是与每个表相关的一些属性。

trans-unit.source: Data in subsequent write/2 calls is buffered until at least Size bytes are buffered, or until the oldest buffered data is Delay milliseconds old. Then all buffered data is written in one operating system call. The buffered data is also flushed before some other file operation than write/2 is executed.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲随后的 write/2 调用中的数据，直到至少缓冲了 Size 字节，或者直到最早的缓冲数据为 Delay 毫秒。然后将所有缓冲的数据写入一个操作系统调用中。在执行除 write/2 以外的其他文件操作之前，还将刷新缓冲的数据。

trans-unit.source: Data is organized as a set of dynamic tables, which can store tuples. Each table is created by a process. When the process terminates, the table is automatically destroyed. Every table has access rights set at creation.
trans-unit.target: 数据被组织成一组动态表,可以存储元组。每个表由一个进程创建。当进程终止时,表会自动销毁。每个表在创建时都设置了访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Data model
trans-unit.target: 数据模型

trans-unit.source: Data retrieval and matching can be performed efficiently if the key for the record is known. Conversely, if the key is unknown, all records in a table must be searched. The larger the table, the more time consuming it becomes. To remedy this problem, Mnesia indexing capabilities are used to improve data retrieval and matching of records.
trans-unit.target: 如果知道记录的密钥，则可以有效地执行数据检索和匹配。相反，如果键未知，则必须搜索表中的所有记录。该表越大，则消耗的时间越多。为了解决此问题， Mnesia 索引功能用于改善数据检索和记录的匹配。

trans-unit.source: Data sent between distributed Erlang nodes is encoded in the Erlang external format. You must therefore encode and decode Erlang terms into byte streams if you want to use the distribution protocol to communicate between a C program and Erlang.
trans-unit.target: 分布式Erlang节点之间发送的数据是以Erlang外部格式编码的。因此,如果你想使用分布式协议在C程序和Erlang之间进行通信,你必须将Erlang术语编码并解码成字节流。

trans-unit.source: Data stored by mnesia is not handled.
trans-unit.target: mnesia存储的数据不做处理。

trans-unit.source: Data types
trans-unit.target: 数据类型

trans-unit.source: Database configuration data
trans-unit.target: 数据库配置数据

trans-unit.source: Database schema can be dynamically reconfigured at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 数据库模式可以在运行时动态重新配置。

trans-unit.source: Database transactions can be distributed, and many functions can be called within one transaction.
trans-unit.target: 数据库事务可以是分布式的,在一个事务中可以调用很多函数。

trans-unit.source: Datagrams with a TTL of 1 are not forwarded beyond the local network. Defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: TTL为1的数据报不会转发到本地网络之外。默认为 1 。

trans-unit.source: Date and time of the request (RFC 1123).
trans-unit.target: 请求的日期和时间（ RFC 1123 ）。

trans-unit.source: Deactivates the fragmentation properties of a table. The number of fragments must be 1. No other table can refer to this table in its foreign key.
trans-unit.target: 停用表的碎片属性。片段数必须为 1 。没有其他表可以在其外键中引用该表。

trans-unit.source: Deadlocks can occur when concurrent processes set and release locks on the same records. Mnesia employs a "wait-die" strategy to resolve these situations. If Mnesia suspects that a deadlock can occur when a transaction tries to set a lock, the transaction is forced to release all its locks and sleep for a while. The Fun in the transaction is evaluated once more.
trans-unit.target: 当并发进程在同一记录上设置和释放锁时，可能会发生死锁。 Mnesia 采用“等待死亡”策略来解决这些情况。如果 Mnesia 怀疑在事务尝试设置锁时会发生死锁，则该事务将被迫释放其所有锁并休眠一段时间。再次评估交易中的乐趣。

trans-unit.source: Debug = trace | debug | disable
trans-unit.target: 调试= trace | debug | disable

trans-unit.source: Debug events from other modules are still not logged.
trans-unit.target: 其他模块的调试事件仍然没有被记录。

trans-unit.source: Debug option that can be used when starting a gen_statem server through, enter_loop/4-6.
trans-unit.target: 通过 enter_loop/4-6 启动 gen_statem 服务器时可以使用的调试选项。

trans-unit.source: Debugger emulates the stack trace by keeping track of recently called interpreted functions. (The real stack trace cannot be used, as it shows which functions of Debugger have been called, rather than which interpreted functions.)
trans-unit.target: Debugger通过跟踪最近调用的解释函数来模拟堆栈跟踪(不能使用真实的堆栈跟踪,因为它显示了Debugger的哪些函数被调用,而不是哪些解释函数)。不能使用真正的堆栈跟踪,因为它显示的是Debugger的哪些函数被调用,而不是哪些解释函数。

trans-unit.source: Debugger is a graphical user interface for the Erlang interpreter, which can be used for debugging and testing of Erlang programs. For example, breakpoints can be set, code can be single-stepped and variable values can be displayed and changed.
trans-unit.target: 调试器是Erlang解释器的图形化用户界面,可用于Erlang程序的调试和测试。例如,可以设置断点,可以单步执行代码,可以显示和更改变量值。

trans-unit.source: Debugger might at some point start tracing on the processes that execute the interpreted code. This means that a conflict occurs if tracing by other means is started on any of these processes.
trans-unit.target: 调试器可能会在某些时候开始跟踪执行解释代码的进程。这意味着,如果在这些进程中的任何一个进程上通过其他方式启动跟踪,就会发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: Debugger/Interpreter Interface.
trans-unit.target: 调试器/解释器接口。

trans-unit.source: Debugging Mnesia applications
trans-unit.target: 调试 Mnesia 应用程序

trans-unit.source: Debugging a Mnesia application can be difficult for various reasons, primarily related to difficulties in understanding how the transaction and table load mechanisms work. Another source of confusion can be the semantics of nested transactions.
trans-unit.target: 出于各种原因，调试 Mnesia 应用程序可能会很困难，这主要与理解事务和表加载机制的工作原理上的困难有关。混乱的另一个来源可能是嵌套事务的语义。

trans-unit.source: Debugging using the dbg toolkit.
trans-unit.target: 使用dbg工具箱进行调试。

trans-unit.source: Debugs a single process. The module Module is interpreted and apply(Module,Name,Args) is called. This opens an Attach Process window. For details, see the User's Guide.
trans-unit.target: 调试单个进程。解释模块 Module 并调用 apply(Module,Name,Args) 。这将打开“附加过程”窗口。有关详细信息，请参见《用户指南》。

trans-unit.source: Debugs the escript. Starts the debugger, loads the module containing the main/1 function into the debugger, sets a breakpoint in main/1, and invokes main/1. If the module is precompiled, it must be explicitly compiled with option debug_info.
trans-unit.target: 调试脚本。启动调试器，将包含 main/1 函数的模块加载到调试器中，在 main/1 中设置一个断点，然后调用 main/1 。如果模块是预编译的，则必须使用选项 debug_info 对其进行显式编译。

trans-unit.source: Decide that the processing of these action requests will take a long time and that the originator should get an immediate 'TransactionPending' reply as interim response. The actual processing of these action requests instead should be delegated to the the handle_trans_long_request/3 callback function with the req_data() as one of its arguments.
trans-unit.target: 决定这些动作请求的处理需要很长的时间,发起者应该立即得到一个 "TransactionPending "的回复作为临时响应。这些操作请求的实际处理应该委托给handle_trans_long_request/3回调函数,并将req_data()作为其参数之一。

trans-unit.source: Decide that these action requests shall be ignored completely.
trans-unit.target: 决定对这些行动请求完全不予理会。

trans-unit.source: Decide where the installation should be located on the target machine, run the Install script on the build machine, and package the installed installation. The installation just need to be unpacked at the right location on the target machine:
trans-unit.target: 确定安装应在目标计算机上的何处，在构建计算机上运行 Install 脚本，并打包已安装的安装。只需要在目标机器上的正确位置解压缩安装包即可：

trans-unit.target: 解码(解析)一个属性参数构造。

trans-unit.source: Decode a Diameter message.
trans-unit.target: 对Diameter信息进行解码。

trans-unit.source: Decode a megaco message.
trans-unit.target: 解码巨型信息。

trans-unit.source: Decode and encode of Diameter messages.
trans-unit.target: Diameter信息的解码和编码。

trans-unit.source: Decodes PEM binary data and returns entries as ASN.1 DER encoded entities.
trans-unit.target: 对PEM二进制数据进行解码,并以ASN.1 DER编码实体返回条目。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a GCC long long or Visual C++ __int64 (64-bit) integer from the binary format. This function is missing in the VxWorks port.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码GCC long long 或Visual C ++ __int64 （64位）整数。VxWorks端口中缺少此功能。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a GCC unsigned long long or Visual C++ unsigned __int64 (64-bit) integer from the binary format. This function is missing in the VxWorks port.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码GCC unsigned long long 或Visual C ++ unsigned __int64 （64位）整数。VxWorks端口中缺少此功能。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a PEM entry. pem_decode/1 returns a list of PEM entries. Notice that if the PEM entry is of type 'SubjectPublickeyInfo', it is further decoded to an rsa_public_key() or dsa_public_key().
trans-unit.target: 解码PEM条目。 pem_decode/1 返回PEM条目的列表。请注意，如果PEM条目的类型为'SubjectPublickeyInfo'，则将其进一步解码为 rsa_public_key() 或 dsa_public_key() 。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a base64-encoded string to plain ASCII. See RFC 4648.
trans-unit.target: 将base64编码的字符串解码为纯ASCII。参见 RFC 4648 。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a binary from the binary format. Parameter len is set to the actual size of the binary. Notice that ei_decode_binary() assumes that there is enough room for the binary. The size required can be fetched by ei_get_type().
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码二进制。参数 len 设置为二进制的实际大小。请注意， ei_decode_binary() 假定二进制文件有足够的空间。所需大小可通过 ei_get_type() 获取。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a boolean value from the binary format. A boolean is actually an atom, true decodes 1 and false decodes 0.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码布尔值。布尔实际上是一个原子， true 解码为1， false 解码为0。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a char (8-bit) integer between 0-255 from the binary format. For historical reasons the returned integer is of type char. Your C code is to consider the returned value to be of type unsigned char even if the C compilers and system can define char to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码0-255之间的char（8位）整数。由于历史原因，返回的整数为 char 类型。即使C编译器和系统可以定义要签名的 char ，您的C代码也应将返回值视为 unsigned char 类型。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a double-precision (64-bit) floating point number from the binary format.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码一个双精度(64位)浮点数。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a fun from the binary format. Parameter p is to be NULL or point to an erlang_fun structure. This is the only decode function that allocates memory. When the erlang_fun is no longer needed, it is to be freed with free_fun. (This has to do with the arbitrary size of the environment for a fun.)
trans-unit.target: 解码二进制格式的乐趣。参数 p 为 NULL 或指向 erlang_fun 结构。这是唯一分配内存的解码功能。当不再需要 erlang_fun 时，将使用 free_fun 将其释放。（这与环境的任意大小有关，这很有趣。）

trans-unit.source: Decodes a list header from the binary format. The number of elements is returned in arity. The arity+1 elements follow (the last one is the tail of the list, normally an empty list). If arity is 0, it is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码列表头。元素的数量以 arity 返回。随后是 arity+1 元素（最后一个是列表的尾部，通常是一个空列表）。如果 arity 为 0 ，则为空列表。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a list of bytes into an SNMP Message, but does not decode the data part of the Message. That means, data is still a list of bytes, normally an encoded PDU (v1 and V2) or an encoded and possibly encrypted scopedPDU (v3).
trans-unit.target: 将字节列表解码为SNMP消息，但不解码消息的数据部分。这意味着，数据仍然是字节列表，通常是已编码的 PDU （v1和V2）或已编码并且可能已加密的 scopedPDU （v3）。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a list of bytes into an SNMP Message. Note, if there is a v3 message, the msgSecurityParameters are not decoded. They must be explicitly decoded by a call to a security model specific decoding function, e.g. dec_usm_security_parameters/1. Also note, if the scopedPDU is encrypted, the OCTET STRING encoded encryptedPDU will be present in the data field.
trans-unit.target: 将字节列表解码为SNMP消息。注意，如果有v3消息，则不会解码 msgSecurityParameters 。必须通过调用特定于安全模型的解码函数（例如 dec_usm_security_parameters/1 )来明确解码它们。还要注意，如果范围 scopedPDU 被加密，则OCTET STRING编码的 encryptedPDU PDU将出现在 data 字段中。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a list of bytes into an SNMP Pdu.
trans-unit.target: 将一个字节列表解码为SNMP Pdu。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a list of bytes into an SNMP ScopedPdu.
trans-unit.target: 将一个字节列表解码为SNMP ScopedPdu。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a list of bytes into an SNMP UsmSecurityParameters
trans-unit.target: 将一个字节列表解码为SNMP UsmSecurityParameters。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a list of bytes into either a scoped pdu record, or - if the scoped pdu was encrypted - to a list of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将一个字节列表解码为一个范围内的pdu记录,或者--如果范围内的pdu是加密的--解码为一个字节列表。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a long integer from the binary format. If the code is 64 bits, the function ei_decode_long() is the same as ei_decode_longlong().
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码一个长整数。如果代码是64位，则函数 ei_decode_long() 与 ei_decode_longlong() 相同。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a map header from the binary format. The number of key-value pairs is returned in *arity. Keys and values follow in this order: K1, V1, K2, V2, ..., Kn, Vn. This makes a total of arity*2 terms. If arity is zero, it is an empty map. A correctly encoded map does not have duplicate keys.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码地图头。键值对的数量以 *arity 返回。键和值的顺序如下： K1, V1, K2, V2, ..., Kn, Vn 。这使得总共 arity*2 项。如果 arity 为零，则为空映射。正确编码的地图没有重复的键。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a port identifier from the binary format.
trans-unit.target: 将二进制格式的端口标识符解码。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a possibly hexadecimal encoded URI.
trans-unit.target: 解码一个可能是十六进制编码的URI。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a process identifier (pid) from the binary format.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码一个进程标识符(pid)。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a public-key ASN.1 DER encoded entity.
trans-unit.target: 解码一个公钥ASN.1 DER编码的实体。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a reference from the binary format.
trans-unit.target: 将二进制格式的引用解码。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a string from the binary format. A string in Erlang is a list of integers between 0 and 255. Notice that as the string is just a list, sometimes lists are encoded as strings by term_to_binary/1, even if it was not intended.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码字符串。Erlang中的字符串是一个介于0到255之间的整数的列表。请注意，由于该字符串只是一个列表，因此有时列表会被 term_to_binary/1 编码为字符串，即使这不是故意的。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a term from the binary format. The term is return in t as a ETERM*, so t is actually an ETERM** (see erl_eterm). The term is later to be deallocated.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码术语。该术语以 ETERM* 形式返回 t ，因此 t 实际上是 ETERM** （请参阅 erl_eterm ）。该术语稍后将被取消分配。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a tuple header, the number of elements is returned in arity. The tuple elements follow in order in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 解码一个元组标头，以 arity 返回元素的数量。元组元素在缓冲区中顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an ASN.1 DER-encoded PKIX certificate. Option otp uses the customized ASN.1 specification OTP-PKIX.asn1 for decoding and also recursively decode most of the standard parts.
trans-unit.target: 解码ASN.1 DER编码的PKIX证书。选项 otp 使用定制的ASN.1规范OTP-PKIX.asn1进行解码，并且还递归解码大多数标准部分。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an Erlang trace token from the binary format.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码一个Erlang跟踪标记。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an SSH file-binary. In the case of known_hosts or auth_keys, the binary can include one or more lines of the file. Returns a list of public keys and their attributes, possible attribute values depends on the file type represented by the binary.
trans-unit.target: 解码SSH文件二进制文件。如果是 known_hosts 或 auth_keys ，则二进制文件可以包含文件的一行或多行。返回公共密钥及其属性的列表，可能的属性值取决于二进制表示的文件类型。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an atom from the binary format. The NULL-terminated name of the atom is placed at p. At most MAXATOMLEN bytes can be placed in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码原子。原子的以 NULL 结尾的名称位于 p 处。至多 MAXATOMLEN 字节可以被放置在缓冲器中。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an atom from the binary format. The NULL-terminated name of the atom is placed in buffer at p of length plen bytes.
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码原子。该 NULL 的原子的封端的名称在被置于缓冲器 p 长度的 plen 字节。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an integer in the binary format to a GMP mpz_t integer. To use this function, the ei library must be configured and compiled to use the GMP library.
trans-unit.target: 将二进制格式的整数解码为GMP mpz_t 整数。要使用此功能，必须将 ei 库配置并编译为使用GMP库。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an unsigned long integer from the binary format. If the code is 64 bits, the function ei_decode_ulong() is the same as ei_decode_ulonglong().
trans-unit.target: 从二进制格式解码一个无符号的长整数。如果代码是64位，则函数 ei_decode_ulong() 与 ei_decode_ulonglong() 相同。

trans-unit.source: Decodes any term, or at least tries to. If the term pointed at by *index in buf fits in the term union, it is decoded, and the appropriate field in term->value is set, and *index is incremented by the term size.
trans-unit.target: 解码任何术语，或至少尝试这么做。如果长期指着由 *index 在 buf 在千篇一律 term 联盟，它被解码，并在相应的字段 term->value 被设置，并且 *index 由项大小递增。

trans-unit.source: Decodes the binary Bin according to the packet protocol specified by Type. Similar to the packet handling done by sockets with option {packet,Type}.
trans-unit.target: 根据 Type 指定的数据包协议对二进制 Bin 进行解码。与套接字使用选项 {packet,Type}. 进行的数据包处理类似。

trans-unit.source: Decodes the reply.
trans-unit.target: 对答复进行解码。

trans-unit.source: Decodes the version magic number for the Erlang binary term format. It must be the first token in a binary term.
trans-unit.target: 解码Erlang二进制术语格式的版本魔术号。它必须是二进制术语中的第一个标记。

trans-unit.source: Decompress a megaco component.
trans-unit.target: 解压一个megaco组件。

trans-unit.source: Decompresses as much data as possible. It can introduce some output latency (reading input without producing any output).
trans-unit.target: 尽可能多的解压数据。它可能会引入一些输出延迟(读取输入而不产生任何输出)。

trans-unit.source: Decreases the suspend count on the process identified by Suspendee. Suspendee is previously to have been suspended through erlang:suspend_process/2 or erlang:suspend_process/1 by the process calling erlang:resume_process(Suspendee). When the suspend count on Suspendee reaches zero, Suspendee is resumed, that is, its state is changed from suspended into the state it had before it was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 减少对鉴定过程中的暂停次数 Suspendee 。 Suspendee 预先已通过悬浮 erlang:suspend_process/2 或 erlang:suspend_process/1 由过程调用 erlang:resume_process(Suspendee) 。当挂起计数上 Suspendee 达到零， Suspendee 恢复，也就是说，它的状态从暂停到它有它暂停之前的状态改变。

trans-unit.source: Decrements map iterator to point to the previous key-value entry.
trans-unit.target: 递减映射迭代器,指向前一个键值条目。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the reference count of the port data lock passed as argument (pdl).
trans-unit.target: 减少作为参数（ pdl ）传递的端口数据锁的引用计数。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the reference count on bin and returns the reference count reached after the decrement.
trans-unit.target: 减少 bin 上的参考计数，并返回减少后达到的参考计数。

trans-unit.source: Decrypt CipherText according to Type block cipher.
trans-unit.target: 根据 Type 块密码解密 CipherText 。

trans-unit.source: Decrypt CipherText according to Type block cipher. IVec is an arbitrary initializing vector.
trans-unit.target: 根据 Type 块密码解密 CipherText 。 IVec 是任意初始化向量。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts CipherText according to the stream cipher Type specified in stream_init/3. PlainText can be any number of bytes. The initial State is created using stream_init. NewState must be passed into the next call to stream_decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 根据stream_init / 3中指定的流密码 Type 解密 CipherText 。 PlainText 可以是任意数量的字节。初始 State 是使用 stream_init 创建的。必须将 NewState 传递到下一个对 stream_decrypt 的调用中。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts EncryptFileName, previously generated with ct:encrypt_config_file/2,3. The original file contents is saved in the target file. The encryption key, a string, must be available in a text file named .ct_config.crypt, either in the current directory, or the home directory of the user (it is searched for in that order).
trans-unit.target: 解密 EncryptFileName ，以前使用 ct:encrypt_config_file/2,3 生成。原始文件内容保存在目标文件中。加密密钥（字符串）必须在名为 .ct_config.crypt 的文本文件中可用，该文本文件位于当前目录或用户的主目录中（按此顺序搜索）。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts EncryptFileName, previously generated with ct:encrypt_config_file/2,3. The original file contents is saved in the target file. The key must have the same value as that used for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 解密 EncryptFileName ，以前使用 ct:encrypt_config_file/2,3 生成。原始文件内容保存在目标文件中。密钥必须与用于加密的密钥具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the CipherText, encrypted with private_encrypt/4(or equivalent function) using the PrivateKey, and returns the plaintext (message digest). This is a low level signature verification operation used for instance by older versions of the SSL protocol. See also public_key:decrypt_public/[2,3]
trans-unit.target: 使用 PrivateKey 解密使用 private_encrypt/4 （或等效功能）加密的 CipherText ，并返回纯文本（消息摘要）。这是低级签名验证操作，例如，较早版本的SSL协议使用该操作。另请参见 public_key:decrypt_public/[2,3]

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the CipherText, encrypted with public_encrypt/4 (or equivalent function) using the PrivateKey, and returns the plaintext (message digest). This is a low level signature verification operation used for instance by older versions of the SSL protocol. See also public_key:decrypt_private/[2,3]
trans-unit.target: 使用 PrivateKey 解密用 public_encrypt/4 （或等效函数）加密的 CipherText ，并返回纯文本（消息摘要）。这是低级签名验证操作，例如，较早版本的SSL协议使用该操作。另请参见 public_key:decrypt_private/[2,3]

trans-unit.source: Default :: Type) ->
trans-unit.target: 默认::类型）->

trans-unit.source: Default Category is default, default Importance is ?STD_IMPORTANCE, and default value for FormatArgs is [].
trans-unit.target: 默认 Category 是 default ，默认 Importance 是 ?STD_IMPORTANCE 的，并且默认值 FormatArgs 是 [] 。

trans-unit.source: Default Characters is the set of nonbreakable whitespace codepoints, defined as Pattern_White_Space in Unicode Standard Annex #31. By default, Dir is both.
trans-unit.target: 默认 Characters 是不可破坏的空白代码点的集合，在 Unicode Standard Annex #31 定义为Pattern_White_Space 。 By default, Dir 是 both 。

trans-unit.source: Default extensions included in CA certificates if not otherwise specified are:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有特别说明,CA证书中默认的扩展名包括:

trans-unit.source: Default extensions included in the server peer cert if not otherwise specified are:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有另外指定,服务器对等证书中包括的默认扩展是:

trans-unit.source: Default formatter for Logger.
trans-unit.target: 记录仪的默认格式化。

trans-unit.source: Default is 10 timutes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 10 timutes 。

trans-unit.source: Default is 1000.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1000 。

trans-unit.source: Default is 100.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 100 。

trans-unit.source: Default is 21.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 21 。

trans-unit.source: Default is 30000.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 30000 。

trans-unit.source: Default is 5000.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 5000 。

trans-unit.source: Default is 60000 (milliseconds).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 60000 （毫秒）。

trans-unit.source: Default is ["./"].
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 ["./"] 。

trans-unit.source: Default is [].
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 [] 。

trans-unit.source: Default is [v1,v2,v3].
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 [v1,v2,v3] 。

trans-unit.source: Default is [{module, snmpa_mib_storage_ets}].
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 [{module, snmpa_mib_storage_ets}] 。

trans-unit.source: Default is any. any is denoted * in the Apache-like configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 any 。在类似Apache的配置文件中， any 符号都用*表示。

trans-unit.source: Default is auto.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 auto 。

trans-unit.source: Default is default.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 default 。

trans-unit.source: Default is disable.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 disable 。

trans-unit.source: Default is false.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Default is ignore.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 ignore 。

trans-unit.source: Default is inet (IPv4).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 inet （IPv4）。

trans-unit.source: Default is inet, legacy option inet6fb4 no longer makes sense and will be translated to inet.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 inet ，旧选项 inet6fb4 不再有意义，它将转换为inet。

trans-unit.source: Default is infinity.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 infinity 。

trans-unit.source: Default is ip_comm.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 ip_comm 。

trans-unit.source: Default is keep.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 keep 。

trans-unit.source: Default is master.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 master 。

trans-unit.source: Default is none.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 none 。

trans-unit.source: Default is normal.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 normal 。

trans-unit.source: Default is passive.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 passive 。

trans-unit.source: Default is permanent for the agent and transient for the manager.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 permanent 的代理和 transient 的经理。

trans-unit.source: Default is pretty. If the error log is meant to be read directly by a human, pretty is the best option.
trans-unit.target: 默认是 pretty 。如果错误日志是要由人类直接读取的，那么 pretty 是最好的选择。

trans-unit.source: Default is read_write.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 read_write 。

trans-unit.source: Default is silence.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 silence 。

trans-unit.source: Default is snmpa_error_logger.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 snmpa_error_logger 。

trans-unit.source: Default is snmpa_net_if.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 snmpa_net_if 。

trans-unit.source: Default is snmpa_net_if_filter.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 snmpa_net_if_filter 。

trans-unit.source: Default is snmpm_net_if.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 snmpm_net_if 。

trans-unit.source: Default is snmpm_net_if_filter.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 snmpm_net_if_filter 。

trans-unit.source: Default is snmpm_user_default.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 snmpm_user_default 。

trans-unit.source: Default is stream for all port types and use_stdio for spawned ports.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有端口类型，默认为 stream ；对于衍生端口，默认为 use_stdio 。

trans-unit.source: Default is string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 string 。

trans-unit.source: Default is terminate.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 terminate 。

trans-unit.source: Default is true (in which case the mibs_cache_opts() default values apply).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 true （在这种情况下，将应用 mibs_cache_opts() 默认值）。

trans-unit.source: Default is true.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Default is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Default is volatile.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 volatile 。

trans-unit.source: Default is {os_sup, error_report, [Tag]} which will send the event to the error logger using error_logger:error_report(Tag, Msg). Tag is the value of os_sup_errortag, see below.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 {os_sup, error_report, [Tag]} ，它将使用 error_logger:error_report(Tag, Msg) 将事件发送到错误记录器。 Tag 是 os_sup_errortag 的值，请参见下文。

trans-unit.source: Default is {time, local}.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 {time, local} 。

trans-unit.source: Default is [{"html","text/html"},{"htm","text/html"}].
trans-unit.target: 默认为[{"html","text/html"},{"htm","text/html"}]。

trans-unit.source: Default is the pid of the process calling the request function (self()).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为调用请求函数（ self() ）的进程的 pid 。

trans-unit.source: Default is the result of the call: erlang:nodes().
trans-unit.target: 默认是调用的结果： erlang:nodes() 。

trans-unit.source: Default is the string "HTTP/1.1".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为字符串 "HTTP/1.1" 。

trans-unit.source: Default is the value of option timeout.

trans-unit.source: Defaults to brutal_purge. It controls what action to take with processes executing old code before loading the new module version. If the value is brutal_purge, the processes are killed. If the value is soft_purge, release_handler:install_release/1 returns {error,{old_processes,Mod}}.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 brutal_purge 。它控制加载新模块版本之前执行旧代码的进程应采取的措施。如果值为 brutal_purge ，则将终止进程。如果值为 soft_purge ，则 release_handler:install_release/1 返回 {error,{old_processes,Mod}} }。

trans-unit.source: Defaults to brutal_purge. It controls what action to take with processes that are executing old code when the new module version has been loaded. If the value is brutal_purge, the code is purged when the release is made permanent and the processes are killed. If the value is soft_purge, the release handler purges the old code when no remaining processes execute the code.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 brutal_purge 。它控制了在加载新模块版本后对执行旧代码的进程采取什么措施。如果值为 brutal_purge ，则在永久释放版本并终止进程时清除代码。如果值为 soft_purge ，则在没有其余进程执行代码时，释放处理程序将清除旧代码。

trans-unit.source: Defaults to discard.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 discard 。

trans-unit.source: Defaults to dynamic. It specifies if the code is "dynamic", that is, if a process using the module spontaneously switches to new code, or if it is "static". When doing an advanced update and upgrade, the new version of a dynamic module is loaded before the process is asked to change code. When downgrading, the process is asked to change code before loading the new version. For static modules, the new version is loaded before the process is asked to change code, both in the case of upgrading and downgrading. Callback modules are dynamic.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 dynamic 。它指定代码是否是“动态的”，即使用模块的过程是否自发地切换到新代码，或者它是“静态的”。在进行高级更新和升级时，将在要求流程更改代码之前加载动态模块的新版本。降级时，要求过程在加载新版本之前更改代码。对于静态模块，无论是升级还是降级，都将在要求过程更改代码之前加载新版本。回调模块是动态的。

trans-unit.source: Defaults to {gen_tcp, tcp, tcp_closed, tcp_error} for TLS and {gen_udp, udp, udp_closed, udp_error} for DTLS. Can be used to customize the transport layer. For TLS the callback module must implement a reliable transport protocol, behave as gen_tcp, and have functions corresponding to inet:setopts/2, inet:getopts/2, inet:peername/1, inet:sockname/1, and inet:port/1. The callback gen_tcp is treated specially and calls inet directly. For DTLS this feature must be considered exprimental.
trans-unit.target: 对于TLS，默认为 {gen_tcp, tcp, tcp_closed, tcp_error} ，对于DTLS {gen_udp, udp, udp_closed, udp_error} 为{gen_udp，udp，udp_closed，udp_error}。可用于自定义传输层。对于TLS，回调模块必须实现可靠的传输协议，其行为类似于 gen_tcp ，并且具有与 inet:setopts/2 ， inet:getopts/2 ， inet:peername/1 ， inet:sockname/1 和 inet:port/1 。回调 gen_tcp 被特殊对待并直接调用 inet 。对于DTLS，必须将此功能视为试用版。

trans-unit.source: Defines the backend data module of the SNMP agent mib-server as defined by the snmpa_mib_data behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 定义 snmpa_mib_data 行为定义的SNMP代理mib-server的后端数据模块。

trans-unit.source: Defines the contents of the AVPs of the application having type Grouped. The section content consists of definitions of the form specified in section 4.4 of RFC 6733, "Grouped AVP Values".
trans-unit.target: 定义具有Grouped类型的应用程序的AVP的内容。本节内容由RFC 6733的4.4节 "分组AVP值 "中规定的形式的定义组成。

trans-unit.source: Defines the directory where the error log files are located. Default is the directory specified by application environment variable error_logger_mf_dir, see sasl(6).
trans-unit.target: 定义错误日志文件所在的目录。缺省值为应用程序环境变量 error_logger_mf_dir 指定的目录，请参见 sasl(6) 。

trans-unit.source: Defines the email-address of the server administrator to be included in any error messages returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: 定义服务器管理员的电子邮件地址,以包含在服务器返回的任何错误信息中。

trans-unit.source: Defines the file format of the log files. See disk_log for details. If the internal file format is used, the log file is repaired after a crash. When a log file is repaired, data can disappear. When the external file format is used, httpd does not start if the log file is broken. Default is external.
trans-unit.target: 定义日志文件的文件格式。有关详细信息，请参见 disk_log 。如果使用内部文件格式，则崩溃后将修复日志文件。修复日志文件后，数据可能会消失。使用外部文件格式时，如果日志文件损坏，则 httpd 不会启动。默认为 external 。

trans-unit.source: Defines the filename of the (disk_log(3)) access log file logging incoming requests. If the filename does not begin with a slash (/), it is assumed to be relative to the server_root.
trans-unit.target: 定义（ disk_log(3) ）访问日志文件的文件名，记录进入的请求。如果文件名不是以斜杠（/）开头，则假定它是相对于 server_root 的。

trans-unit.source: Defines the filename of the (disk_log(3)) access log file logging incoming security events, that is, authenticated requests. If the filename does not begin with a slash (/), it is assumed to be relative to the server_root.
trans-unit.target: 定义（ disk_log(3) ）访问日志文件的文件名，该文件记录传入的安全事件，即已验证的请求。如果文件名不是以斜杠（/）开头，则假定它是相对于 server_root 的。

trans-unit.source: Defines the filename of the (disk_log(3)) error log file to be used to log server errors. If the filename does not begin with a slash (/), it is assumed to be relative to the server_root.
trans-unit.target: 定义（ disk_log(3) ）错误日志文件的文件名，用于记录服务器错误。如果文件名不是以斜杠（/）开头，则假定它是相对于 server_root 的。

trans-unit.source: Defines the filename of the access log file to be used to log incoming requests. If the filename does not begin with a slash (/), it is assumed to be relative to the server_root.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于记录传入请求的访问日志文件的文件名。如果文件名不是以斜杠（/）开头，则假定它是相对于 server_root 的。

trans-unit.source: Defines the filename of the access log file to be used to log security events. If the filename does not begin with a slash (/), it is assumed to be relative to the server_root.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于记录安全事件的访问日志文件的文件名。如果文件名不是以斜杠（/）开头，则假定它是相对于 server_root 的。

trans-unit.source: Defines the filename of the error log file to be used to log server errors. If the filename does not begin with a slash (/), it is assumed to be relative to the server_root.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于记录服务器错误的错误日志文件的文件名。如果文件名不是以斜杠（/）开头，则假定它是相对于 server_root 的。

trans-unit.source: Defines the groups the server may choose among when diffie-hellman-group-exchange is negotiated. See RFC 4419 for details. The three variants of this option are:
trans-unit.target: 定义在协商diffie-hellman-group-exchange时服务器可以选择的组。有关详细信息，请参见 RFC 4419 。此选项的三个变体是：

trans-unit.source: Defines the home directory of the server, where log files, and so on, can be stored. Relative paths specified in other properties refer to this directory.
trans-unit.target: 定义服务器的主目录,日志文件等可以存放在这里。在其他属性中指定的相对路径指的就是这个目录。

trans-unit.source: Defines the integer Number as the Diameter Application Id of the application in question. Can occur at most once and is required if the dictionary defines @messages. The section has empty content.
trans-unit.target: 将整数Number定义为相关应用程序的Diameter Application ID。最多可以出现一次，如果字典定义了 @messages ，则为必填项。该部分内容为空。

trans-unit.source: Defines the integer Number as the Vendor-Id of the AVPs listed in the section content, overriding the @vendor default. The section content consists of AVP names.
trans-unit.target: 将整数Number定义为本节内容中列出的AVP的Vendor-Id，覆盖 @vendor 的默认值。本节内容由AVP名称组成。

trans-unit.source: Defines the integer Number as the the default Vendor-Id of AVPs for which the V flag is set. Name documents the owner of the application but is otherwise unused. Can occur at most once and is required if an AVP sets the V flag and is not otherwise assigned a Vendor-Id. The section has empty content.
trans-unit.target: 定义整数Number作为设置V标志的AVP的默认Vendor-Id。名称记录了应用程序的所有者,但在其他方面没有使用。最多可以出现一次,如果一个AVP设置了V标志,并且没有分配Vendor-Id,则需要该名称。该部分内容为空。

trans-unit.source: Defines the look of the value of the server header.
trans-unit.target: 定义服务器头的值的样子。

trans-unit.source: Defines the maximum number of varbinds allowed in a Get-BULK response.
trans-unit.target: 定义Get-BULK响应中允许的最大varbinds数量。

trans-unit.source: Defines the messages of the application. The section content consists of definitions of the form specified in section 3.2 of RFC 6733, "Command Code Format Specification".
trans-unit.target: 定义了应用程序的消息。该部分内容由RFC 6733《命令码格式规范》第3.2节规定的格式定义组成。

trans-unit.source: Defines the mib storage module of the SNMP agent as defined by the snmpa_mib_storage behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 定义 snmpa_mib_storage 行为定义的SNMP代理的mib存储模块。

trans-unit.source: Defines the name of a dictionary module containing AVP definitions that should be imported into the current dictionary. The section content consists of the names of those AVPs whose definitions should be imported from the dictionary, an empty list causing all to be imported. Any listed AVPs must not be defined in the current dictionary and it is an error to inherit the same AVP from more than one dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个包含AVP定义的字典模块的名称,这些定义应该被导入到当前的字典中。该部分内容由那些其定义应从字典中导入的AVP的名称组成,一个空列表导致所有的AVP被导入。任何列出的 AVPs 必须在当前字典中没有定义,从一个以上的字典中继承相同的 AVP 是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Defines the name of the generated dictionary module. Can occur at most once and defaults to the name of the dictionary file minus any extension. The section has empty content.
trans-unit.target: 定义生成的字典模块的名称,最多可以出现一次,默认为字典文件的名称减去任何扩展名。最多可出现一次,默认为字典文件的名称减去任何扩展名。该部分内容为空。

trans-unit.source: Defines the name, code, type and flags of individual AVPs. The section consists of definitions of the form
trans-unit.target: 定义各个AVP的名称、代码、类型和标志。本节包括以下形式的定义

trans-unit.source: Defines the read-eval-print loop used in a daemon when a shell is requested by the client. The default is to use the Erlang shell: {shell, start, []}
trans-unit.target: 定义客户端请求外壳程序时守护程序中使用的read-eval-print循环。默认使用Erlang shell： {shell, start, []}

trans-unit.source: Defines the repair option for the persistent database (if and how the table is repaired when opened).
trans-unit.target: 定义持久化数据库的修复选项(打开表时是否以及如何修复)。

trans-unit.source: Defines the system name.
trans-unit.target: 定义系统名称。

trans-unit.source: Defines the system version.
trans-unit.target: 定义系统版本。

trans-unit.source: Defines the time-out for all calls to sys:change_code. If no value is specified or default is specified, the default value defined in sys is used.
trans-unit.target: 定义所有对 sys:change_code 的调用的超时。如果没有指定值或 default 被指定时，在所定义的默认值 sys 被使用。

trans-unit.source: Defines the time-out for all calls to sys:suspend. If no value is specified, the values defined by the Timeout parameter of the upgrade or suspend instructions are used. If default is specified, the default value defined in sys is used.
trans-unit.target: 定义对 sys:suspend 的所有调用的超时。如果未指定任何值，则使用 upgrade 或 suspend 指令的 Timeout 参数定义的值。如果 default 指定，在定义的默认值 sys 使用。

trans-unit.source: Defines the time-out when suspending processes. If no value or default is specified, the default value for sys:suspend is used.
trans-unit.target: 定义挂起进程时的超时。如果未指定任何值或 default 值，则使用 sys:suspend 的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Defines the top directory for the documents that are available on the HTTP server.
trans-unit.target: 定义HTTP服务器上可用文档的顶级目录。

trans-unit.source: Defines the type of packets to use for a socket. Possible values:
trans-unit.target: 定义套接字要使用的数据包类型。可能的值。

trans-unit.source: Defines users to grant access to a given directory using a secret password.
trans-unit.target: 定义用户使用秘密密码授予对指定目录的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Defines values of AVP Name having type Enumerated. Section content consists of names and corresponding integer values. Integer values can be prefixed with 0x to be interpreted as hexadecimal.
trans-unit.target: 定义类型为Enumerated的AVP Name的值。部分内容由名称和相应的整数值组成。整数值可以以0x为前缀,解释为十六进制。

trans-unit.source: Defines what to do if the agent is unable to open an existing database file. terminate means that the agent/manager will terminate, create means that the agent/manager will remove the faulty file(s) and create new ones, and create_db_and_dir means that the agent/manager will create the database file along with any missing parent directories for the database file.
trans-unit.target: 定义代理无法打开现有数据库文件时的处理方法。 terminate 表示代理程序/管理器将终止， create 表示代理程序/管理器将删除错误的文件并创建新文件， create_db_and_dir 表示代理程序/管理器将创建数据库文件以及所有丢失的父目录数据库文件。

trans-unit.source: Defines when parsing the Host-Port part of an URI with an IPv6 address with brackets, if those brackets are to be retained (true) or stripped (false).
trans-unit.target: 定义在解析带有括号的带有IPv6地址的URI的Host-Port部分时，是否保留这些括号（ true ）或剥离这些括号（ false ）。

trans-unit.source: Defines where the SNMP agent configuration files are stored.
trans-unit.target: 定义SNMP代理配置文件的存储位置。

trans-unit.source: Defines where the SNMP agent internal db files are stored.
trans-unit.target: 定义SNMP代理内部db文件的存储位置。

trans-unit.source: Defines where the SNMP manager configuration files are stored.
trans-unit.target: 定义SNMP管理器配置文件的存储位置。

trans-unit.source: Defines where the SNMP manager store persistent data.
trans-unit.target: 定义SNMP管理器存储持久性数据的位置。

trans-unit.source: Defines which modules the HTTP server uses when handling requests. Default is [mod_alias, mod_auth, mod_esi, mod_actions, mod_cgi, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head, mod_log, mod_disk_log]. Notice that some mod-modules are dependent on others, so the order cannot be entirely arbitrary. See the Inets Web Server Modules in the User's Guide for details.
trans-unit.target: 定义HTTP服务器在处理请求时使用的模块。默认值为 [mod_alias, mod_auth, mod_esi, mod_actions, mod_cgi, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head, mod_log, mod_disk_log] 。请注意，某些 mod 模块依赖于其他模块，因此顺序不能完全是任意的。有关详细信息，请参见《用户指南》中的 Inets Web Server Modules 。

trans-unit.source: Defining '$handle_undefined_function'/2 in ordinary application code is highly discouraged. It is very easy to make subtle errors that can take a long time to debug. Furthermore, none of the tools for static code analysis (such as Dialyzer and Xref) supports the use of '$handle_undefined_function'/2 and no such support will be added. Only use this function after having carefully considered other, less dangerous, solutions. One example of potential legitimate use is creating stubs for other sub-systems during testing and debugging.
trans-unit.target: 不建议在普通应用程序代码中定义 '$handle_undefined_function'/2 。进行细微的错误很容易，可能需要很长时间才能调试。此外，用于静态代码分析的工具（例如Dialyzer和Xref） '$handle_undefined_function'/2 支持使用'$ handle_undefined_function'/ 2，并且不会添加此类支持。仅在仔细考虑其他危险程度较小的解决方案后才能使用此功能。潜在合法使用的一个示例是在测试和调试期间为其他子系统创建存根。

trans-unit.source: Defining New AVP Values
trans-unit.target: 定义新的AVP值

trans-unit.source: Definition of c_test:c_break/1:
trans-unit.target: c_test:c_break/1 的定义：

trans-unit.source: Deinstalls a fallback before it has been used to restore the database. This is normally a distributed operation that is either performed on all nodes with disc resident schema, or none. Uninstallation of fallbacks requires Erlang to be operational on all involved nodes, but it does not matter if Mnesia is running or not. Which nodes that are considered as disc-resident nodes is determined from the schema information in the local fallback.
trans-unit.target: 在恢复数据库之前,先卸载一个后备程序。这通常是一个分布式操作,要么在所有有磁盘常驻模式的节点上执行,要么不执行。卸载回退需要Erlang在所有涉及的节点上都能运行,但Mnesia是否运行并不重要。哪些节点被认为是盘驻节点,要根据本地回退中的schema信息来确定。

trans-unit.source: Delay, in milliseconds, for SAC messages (if the delay is enabled, see flags below)
trans-unit.target: SAC消息的延迟（以毫秒为单位）（如果启用了延迟，请参见下面的 flags ）

trans-unit.source: Delete
trans-unit.target: Delete

trans-unit.source: Delete CRLs from the ssl applications local cache.
trans-unit.target: 从ssl应用程序本地缓存中删除CRL。

trans-unit.source: Delete a USM security data (user) from the agent config.
trans-unit.target: 从代理配置中删除一个USM安全数据(用户)。

trans-unit.source: Delete a access definition from the agent config.
trans-unit.target: 删除代理配置中的访问定义。

trans-unit.source: Delete a community from the agent config.
trans-unit.target: 从代理配置中删除一个社区。

trans-unit.source: Delete a context from the agent config.
trans-unit.target: 从代理配置中删除一个上下文。

trans-unit.source: Delete a dictionary entry and send a {et, {dict_delete, Key}} tuple to all registered subscribers.
trans-unit.target: 删除一个字典条目,并发送一个{et,{dict_delete,Key}}元组给所有注册的订阅者。

trans-unit.source: Delete a notify definition from the agent config.
trans-unit.target: 删除代理配置中的通知定义。

trans-unit.source: Delete a record from the mib-storage table.
trans-unit.target: 从mib存储表中删除一条记录。

trans-unit.source: Delete a security to group definition from the agent config.
trans-unit.target: 删除代理配置中的安全到组定义。

trans-unit.source: Delete a target address definition from the agent config.
trans-unit.target: 删除代理配置中的目标地址定义。

trans-unit.source: Delete a target parameter definition from the agent config.
trans-unit.target: 删除代理配置中的目标参数定义。

trans-unit.source: Delete a view tree family definition from the agent config.
trans-unit.target: 删除代理配置中的视图树族定义。

trans-unit.source: Delete all objects in the ETS table Tab. The operation is guaranteed to be atomic and isolated.
trans-unit.target: 删除ETS表 Tab 中的所有对象。保证操作是 atomic and isolated 。

trans-unit.source: Delete an entire mib-storage table.
trans-unit.target: 删除整个mib存储表。

trans-unit.source: Delete an entry.
trans-unit.target: 删除一个条目。

trans-unit.source: Delete character
trans-unit.target: 删除字符

trans-unit.source: Delete data set with set_process_metadata/1 or update_process_metadata/1.
trans-unit.target: 使用 set_process_metadata/1 或 update_process_metadata/1 删除数据集。

trans-unit.source: Delete the configuration of a user
trans-unit.target: 删除用户的配置

trans-unit.source: Delete the exact object Object from the ETS table, leaving objects with the same key but other differences (useful for type bag). In a duplicate_bag table, all instances of the object are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 从ETS表中删除确切的对象 Object ，使对象具有相同的键但其他不同（对于类型 bag 有用）。在 duplicate_bag 表中，将删除该对象的所有实例。

trans-unit.source: Delete the table EMPLOYEE.
trans-unit.target: 删除表 EMPLOYEE 。

trans-unit.source: Delete word
trans-unit.target: 删除单词

trans-unit.source: Delete.
trans-unit.target: Delete.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a Slave node from the list of allowed slave hosts.
trans-unit.target: Slave 允许的从属主机列表中删除一个从属节点。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a cache entry. Is only called from the cache handling process.
trans-unit.target: 删除一个缓存条目。只在缓存处理过程中调用。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a complete index structure (i.e. the ets table holding the index). The index can no longer be referenced after this call. See the warning note above.
trans-unit.target: 删除完整的索引结构（即保存索引的ets表）。调用后将无法再引用索引。请参阅上面的 warning note 。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a database created with mnesia:create_schema/1. mnesia:delete_schema/1 fails if any of the Erlang nodes given as DiscNodes are not alive, or if Mnesia is running on any of the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 删除使用 mnesia:create_schema/1 创建的数据库。如果作为 DiscNodes 给出的任何Erlang节点都不活跃，或者如果Mnesia在任何节点上运行，则 mnesia:delete_schema/1 失败。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a directory from the code path. The argument can be an atom Name, in which case the directory with the name .../Name[-Vsn][/ebin] is deleted from the code path. Also, the complete directory name Dir can be specified as argument.
trans-unit.target: 从代码路径中删除目录。参数可以是原子 Name ，在这种情况下，名称 .../Name[-Vsn][/ebin] 的目录将从代码路径中删除。另外，完整目录名称 Dir 可以指定为参数。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a directory specified by Name. The directory must be empty before it can be successfully deleted.
trans-unit.target: 删除 Name 指定的目录。在成功删除目录之前，该目录必须为空。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a file on remote host.
trans-unit.target: 删除远程主机上的文件。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a fragment from a fragmented table. All records in the last fragment are moved to one of the other fragments. All other fragmented tables, which refer to this table in their foreign key, automatically lose their last fragment. Also, their records are dynamically rehashed in the same manner as for the main table.
trans-unit.target: 从碎片表中删除一个碎片。最后一个片段中的所有记录都被移到其他片段中。所有在外键中引用这个表的其他碎片表,都会自动失去最后一个碎片。同时,它们的记录也会以与主表相同的方式被动态重排。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a key and its value from the index structure. Returns a new structure.
trans-unit.target: 从索引结构中删除一个键和它的值。返回一个新的结构。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a module Mod using the low-level instructions remove and purge.
trans-unit.target: 使用低级指令 remove and purge 删除模块 Mod 。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a named value on the current key. The atom default is used for the default value.
trans-unit.target: 删除当前键上的命名值。原子 default 用作默认值。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a node from node_pool. The new node pool affects the list returned from the function mnesia:table_info(Tab, frag_dist).
trans-unit.target: 从 node_pool 删除一个节点。新的节点池会影响从函数 mnesia:table_info(Tab, frag_dist) 返回的列表。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a process group.
trans-unit.target: 删除一个进程组。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a query cursor. Only the owner of the cursor can delete the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 删除一个查询游标。只有游标的所有者可以删除游标。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a table.
trans-unit.target: 删除一个表。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all breakpoints in Module.
trans-unit.target: 删除 Module 中的所有断点。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all breakpoints, or all breakpoints in Module.
trans-unit.target: 删除 Module 所有断点或所有断点。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 删除所有断点。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all entries associated with Key from List.
trans-unit.target: 从 List 中删除与 Key 相关的所有条目。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all entries in the table Tab.
trans-unit.target: 删除表 Tab 中的所有条目。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all instances of a specified object from a table. If a table is of type bag or duplicate_bag, this function can be used to delete only some of the objects with a specified key.
trans-unit.target: 从表中删除指定对象的所有实例。如果表的类型为 bag 或 duplicate_bag ，则此函数可用于仅删除具有指定键的某些对象。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all objects from a table in almost constant time. However, if the table if fixed, delete_all_objects(T) is equivalent to match_delete(T, '_').
trans-unit.target: 在几乎恒定的时间内从表中删除所有对象。但是，如果该表已修复，则 delete_all_objects(T) 等同于 match_delete(T, '_') 。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all objects of table Name and then inserts all the objects of the ETS table EtsTab. The objects are inserted in unspecified order. As ets:safe_fixtable/2 is called, the ETS table must be public or owned by the calling process.
trans-unit.target: 删除表 Name 的所有对象，然后插入ETS表 EtsTab 的所有对象。对象以未指定的顺序插入。由于 ets:safe_fixtable/2 被调用时，ETS表必须是公开或调用进程所拥有。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all objects that match Pattern from table Name. For a description of patterns, see ets:match/2.
trans-unit.target: 从表 Name 中删除与 Pattern 匹配的所有对象。有关模式的描述，请参见 ets:match/2 。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all objects that match pattern Pattern from table Tab. For a description of patterns, see match/2.
trans-unit.target: 从表 Tab 中删除与模式 Pattern 匹配的所有对象。有关模式的描述，请参见 match/2 。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all objects with key Key from table Name.
trans-unit.target: 从表 Name 删除键为 Key 的所有对象。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all objects with key Key from table Tab.
trans-unit.target: 从表 Tab 删除键为 Key 的所有对象。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all records in table Tab with the key Key.
trans-unit.target: 使用键 Key 删除表 Tab 中的所有记录。

trans-unit.source: Deletes an event handler from event manager EventMgrRef. The event manager calls Module:terminate/2 to terminate the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 从事件管理器 EventMgrRef 中删除事件处理程序。事件管理器调用 Module:terminate/2 终止事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Deletes an event handler from the error logger by calling gen_event:delete_handler(error_logger, Handler, []), see gen_event(3).
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 gen_event:delete_handler(error_logger, Handler, []) 从错误记录器中删除事件处理程序，请参见 gen_event(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Deletes an object from the registry. The object is not removed from the registry, it is only marked for later removal so that on later backups to Mnesia, the corresponding object can be removed from the Mnesia table as well. If another object is later created with the same key, the object will be reused.
trans-unit.target: 从注册表中删除对象。该对象不会从注册表中删除，它仅标记为以后删除，以便在以后备份到 Mnesia 时，也可以从 Mnesia 表中删除相应的对象。如果以后使用相同的键创建另一个对象，则该对象将被重用。

trans-unit.source: Deletes configuration data.
trans-unit.target: 删除配置数据。

trans-unit.source: Deletes configuration stored with write_config(Data). Notice that after this call any subsequent calls to read_config must return {error, Error}.
trans-unit.target: 删除存储在 write_config(Data) 中的配置。请注意，在此调用之后，对 read_config 的所有后续调用都必须返回 {error, Error} 。

trans-unit.source: Deletes digraph G. This call is important as digraphs are implemented with ETS. There is no garbage collection of ETS tables. However, the digraph is deleted if the process that created the digraph terminates.
trans-unit.target: 删除有向图 G ^。由于用ETS实现图，所以此调用很重要。没有ETS表的垃圾回收。但是，如果创建图的过程终止，则将删除图。

trans-unit.source: Deletes each object from table Name such that applying match specification MatchSpec to the object returns value true. For a description of match specifications, see the ERTS User's Guide. Returns the number of deleted objects.
trans-unit.target: 从表 Name 中删除每个对象，以便将匹配规范 MatchSpec 应用于该对象将返回值 true 。有关匹配规范的描述，请参见《 ERTS User's Guide 。返回已删除对象的数量。

trans-unit.source: Deletes edge E from digraph G.
trans-unit.target: 删除边缘 E 从有向图 G ^。

trans-unit.source: Deletes edges from digraph G until there are no paths from vertex V1 to vertex V2.
trans-unit.target: 删除有向图 G 的边，直到没有从顶点 V1 到顶点 V2 的 paths 为止。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the breakpoint at Line in Module.
trans-unit.target: 删除在断点处 Line 的 Module 。

trans-unit.target: 在功能 Module:Name/Arity 的每个子句的第一行删除断点。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current key, if it is valid. Calls the Win32 API function RegDeleteKey(). Notice that this call does not change the current key (unlike change_key_create/2). This means that after the call, the current key is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 删除当前密钥（如果有效）。调用Win32 API函数 RegDeleteKey() 。请注意，此调用不会更改当前键（不同于 change_key_create/2 ）。这意味着呼叫后，当前密钥无效。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the edges in list Edges from digraph G.
trans-unit.target: 从图 G 中删除列表 Edges 边缘”中的边缘。

trans-unit.source: Demanding reload when a reload is already in progress is always an error. Using the high-level functions, it is also an error to demand reloading when more than one user has the driver loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在进行重新加载时要求重新加载始终是一个错误。使用高级功能，当加载了多个 user 的驱动程序时，要求重新加载也是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Demands for efficiency when reading data from an I/O server has not only lead to the addition of the get_line and get_chars requests, but has also added the concept of I/O server options. No options are mandatory to implement, but all I/O servers in the Erlang standard libraries honor the binary option, which allows element Data of the io_reply tuple to be a binary instead of a list when possible. If the data is sent as a binary, Unicode data is sent in the standard Erlang Unicode format, that is, UTF-8 (notice that the function of the get_until request still gets list data regardless of the I/O server mode).
trans-unit.target: 从I / O服务器读取数据时对效率的要求不仅导致增加了 get_line 和 get_chars 请求，而且还增加了I / O服务器选项的概念。没有选项是强制性实施，但在二郎标准库中的所有I / O服务器荣誉 binary 选项，它允许元素 Data 中的 io_reply 元组是二进制，而不是一个列表时可能。如果以二进制形式发送数据， get_until 标准Erlang Unicode格式（即UTF-8）发送Unicode数据（请注意，不管I / O服务器模式如何，get_until请求的功能仍然会获取列表数据）。

trans-unit.source: Denotes if the terminal is to echo input. Only supported for the standard shell I/O server (group.erl)
trans-unit.target: 指示终端是否回显输入。仅标准外壳I / O服务器（ group.erl ）支持

trans-unit.source: Denotes the last part of the OID which specifies the index of the row in the table (see RFC1212, 4.1.6 for more information about INDEX).
trans-unit.target: 表示OID的最后一部分,它指定了表中行的索引(关于INDEX的更多信息,请参见RFC1212,4.1.6)。

trans-unit.target: Dependencies

trans-unit.target: 根据 Flag 的不同，调用过程开始订阅（ Flag 等于 true ）或停止订阅（ Flag 等于 false ）到节点状态更改消息。

trans-unit.source: Depending on Unix:
trans-unit.target: 取决于Unix。

trans-unit.target: 根据当前目录,并写在那里。

trans-unit.source: Depending on execution order:
trans-unit.target: 根据执行顺序。

trans-unit.source: Depending on how your state machine is specified, this can be a very useful feature, but it forces you to handle the state enter calls in all states. See also the State Enter Actions chapter.
trans-unit.target: 根据状态机的指定方式，这可能是一个非常有用的功能，但是它会强制您处理所有状态下的状态回车。另请参阅“ State Enter Actions 一章。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the application, it can be a good idea to use the dirty functions for certain operations. Almost all Mnesia functions that can be called within transactions have a dirty equivalent, which is much more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 根据应用的不同,在某些操作中使用dirty函数可能是个好主意。几乎所有可以在事务中调用的Mnesia函数都有一个dirty等价物,效率更高。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the encoding rules, the encoder can also compare the given value to the default value and automatically omit the encoding if the values are equal. How much effort the encoder makes to compare the values depends on the encoding rules. The DER encoding rules forbid encoding a value equal to the default value, so it has a more thorough and time-consuming comparison than the encoders for the other encoding rules.
trans-unit.target: 根据编码规则,编码器还可以将给定值与默认值进行比较,如果数值相等,则自动省略编码。编码器在比较数值上做多少努力取决于编码规则。DER编码规则禁止对与默认值相等的值进行编码,所以它的比较比其他编码规则的编码器更彻底,更费时。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the encoding, different methods of reading and writing data is preferred. The default encoding of latin1 implies using this module (file) for reading and writing data as the interfaces provided here work with byte-oriented data. Using other (Unicode) encodings makes the io(3) functions get_chars, get_line, and put_chars more suitable, as they can work with the full Unicode range.
trans-unit.target: 根据编码方式，首选不同的读写数据方法。 latin1 的默认编码意味着使用此模块（ file ）读取和写入数据，因为此处提供的接口适用于面向字节的数据。使用其他（Unicode）编码使 io(3) 函数 get_chars ， get_line 和 put_chars 更合适，因为它们可以使用完整的Unicode范围。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the platform, the value may need to be quoted if the shell itself interprets certain characters. On Unix, terms containing tuples and lists must be quoted. Terms containing spaces must be quoted on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 根据不同的平台,如果shell本身对某些字符进行解释,则可能需要引用该值。在Unix上,包含元组和列表的术语必须加引号。在所有平台上,包含空格的术语都必须加引号。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the type of Node, the size of some groups may be variable (e.g., the group consisting of all the elements of a tuple), while others always contain the same number of elements - usually exactly one (e.g., the group containing the argument expression of a case-expression). Note, however, that the exact structure of the returned list (for a given node type) should in general not be depended upon, since it might be subject to change without notice.
trans-unit.target: 根据 Node 的类型，某些组的大小可能是可变的（例如，由一个元组的所有元素组成的组），而其他组总是包含相同数量的元素-通常是一个（例如，包含案例表达式的参数表达式）。但是请注意，返回列表的确切结构（对于给定的节点类型）通常不应依赖，因为它可能随时更改，恕不另行通知。

trans-unit.source: Determines if garbage collection is allowed when performing the operation. If {allow_gc, false} is passed, and a garbage collection is needed to determine the result of the operation, the operation is aborted (see information on CheckResult below). The default is to allow garbage collection, that is, {allow_gc, true}.
trans-unit.target: 确定在执行操作时是否允许垃圾回收。如果传递了 {allow_gc, false} ，并且需要垃圾回收来确定操作结果，则该操作将中止（请参阅下面有关 CheckResult 的信息）。默认设置为允许垃圾回收，即 {allow_gc, true} 。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the FTP communication is to be verbose or not.
trans-unit.target: 确定FTP通信是否要啰嗦。

trans-unit.source: Determines retransmission time-out parameters, in milliseconds, for the association(s) specified by assoc_id.
trans-unit.target: 确定由 assoc_id 指定的关联的重传超时参数（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Determines the buffer space that would be needed by t if it were encoded into Erlang external format by erl_encode().
trans-unit.target: 确定 t 被 erl_encode() 编码为Erlang外部格式时t所需的缓冲区空间。

trans-unit.source: Determines the default parameters that this socket tries to negotiate with its peer while establishing an association with it. Is to be set after open/* but before the first connect/*. #sctp_initmsg{} can also be used as ancillary data with the first call of send/* to a new peer (when a new association is created).
trans-unit.target: 确定与该套接字建立关联时，该套接字尝试与其对等方协商的默认参数。将在 open/* 之后但在第一个 connect/* 之前设置。 #sctp_initmsg{} 也可以作为辅助数据使用，第一次将 send/* 调用给新对等方（创建新关联时）。

trans-unit.source: Determines the length of a proper list.
trans-unit.target: 确定适当列表的长度。

trans-unit.source: Determines the maximum chunk size if message fragmentation is used. If 0, the chunk size is limited by the Path MTU only.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用消息分段，则确定最大块大小。如果为 0 ，则块大小仅受路径MTU限制。

trans-unit.source: Determines the time, in seconds, after which an idle association is automatically closed. 0 means that the association is never automatically closed.
trans-unit.target: 确定以秒为单位的时间，之后空闲连接将自动关闭。 0 表示关联永远不会自动关闭。

trans-unit.source: Determines the time-out, in seconds, for flushing unsent data in the close/1 socket call. If the first component of the value tuple is false, the second is ignored. This means that close/1 returns immediately, not waiting for data to be flushed. Otherwise, the second component is the flushing time-out, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 确定在 close/1 套接字调用中刷新未发送数据的超时（以秒为单位）。如果值元组的第一个组成部分为 false ，则忽略第二个组成部分。这意味着 close/1 立即返回，而不等待数据被刷新。否则，第二个组件是冲洗超时（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Determines the type of data returned from recv/1,2.
trans-unit.target: 确定从 recv/1,2 返回的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines various per-address parameters for the association specified by assoc_id and the peer address address (the SCTP protocol supports multi-homing, so more than one address can correspond to a specified association).
trans-unit.target: 为 assoc_id 和对等地址 address 指定的关联确定各种按地址的参数（SCTP协议支持多宿主，因此一个指定的关联可以有多个地址）。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the compiler generates a beam file with the given options. true means that a beam file is generated. false means that the compiler generates some listing file, returns a binary, or merely checks the syntax of the source code.
trans-unit.target: 确定编译器是否使用给定的选项生成 beam 文件。 true 表示生成了一个 beam 文件。 false 表示编译器生成一些列表文件，返回二进制文件或仅检查源代码的语法。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the parser generator should give full information about resolved and unresolved parse action conflicts (true), or only about those conflicts that prevent a parser from being generated from the input grammar (false, the default).
trans-unit.target: 确定解析器生成器是否应该提供有关已解决和未解决的解析动作冲突（ true ）的完整信息，还是仅提供那些阻止从输入语法生成解析器的冲突的完整信息（ false ，默认值）。

trans-unit.source: Determines which module to call for accessing the file server. The default value is ssh_sftpd_file, which uses the file and filelib APIs to access the standard OTP file server. This option can be used to plug in other file servers.
trans-unit.target: 确定要调用哪个模块来访问文件服务器。缺省值为 ssh_sftpd_file ，它使用 file 和 filelib API访问标准OTP文件服务器。此选项可用于插入其他文件服务器。

trans-unit.source: Determining what data to keep after a communication failure is outside the scope of Mnesia. One approach is to determine which "island" contains most of the nodes. Using option {majority,true} for critical tables can be a way to ensure that nodes that are not part of a "majority island" cannot update those tables. Notice that this constitutes a reduction in service on the minority nodes. This would be a tradeoff in favor of higher consistency guarantees.
trans-unit.target: 确定通信失败后保留哪些数据不在 Mnesia 的范围内。一种方法是确定哪个“岛”包含大多数节点。对关键表使用选项 {majority,true} 可以确保不属于“多数岛”的节点无法更新这些表。注意，这减少了少数节点上的服务。这是对更高一致性保证的权衡。

trans-unit.source: Dets organizes data as a linear hash list and the hash list grows gracefully as more data is inserted into the table. Space management on the file is performed by what is called a buddy system. The current implementation keeps the entire buddy system in RAM, which implies that if the table gets heavily fragmented, quite some memory can be used up. The only way to defragment a table is to close it and then open it again with option repair set to force.
trans-unit.target: Dets将数据组织为线性哈希表，并且当将更多数据插入表中时，哈希表会正常增长。文件上的空间管理由所谓的伙伴系统执行。当前的实现将整个伙伴系统保留在RAM中，这意味着如果表严重碎片化，则可能会耗尽一些内存。对表进行碎片整理的唯一方法是将其关闭，然后在选项 repair 设置为 force 的情况下再次打开它。

trans-unit.source: Dets tables must be opened before they can be updated or read, and when finished they must be properly closed. If a table is not properly closed, Dets automatically repairs the table. This can take a substantial time if the table is large. A Dets table is closed when the process which opened the table terminates. If many Erlang processes (users) open the same Dets table, they share the table. The table is properly closed when all users have either terminated or closed the table. Dets tables are not properly closed if the Erlang runtime system terminates abnormally.
trans-unit.target: Dets表在更新或读取之前必须打开,完成后必须正确关闭。如果一个表没有正确关闭,Dets会自动修复该表。如果表很大,这可能需要相当长的时间。当打开表的进程终止时,一个Dets表就被关闭了。如果许多Erlang进程(用户)打开同一个Dets表,它们就会共享该表。当所有用户都终止或关闭了表时,表就被正确地关闭了。如果Erlang运行时系统异常终止,Dets表就不会被正确关闭。

trans-unit.source: Devanagari
trans-unit.target: Devanagari

trans-unit.source: Developers must always invoke the debug_info/4 function and never rely on the Data stored in the debug_info chunk, as it is opaque and may change at any moment. no_debug_info means that chunk "Dbgi" is present, but empty.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员必须始终调用 debug_info/4 函数，并且永远不要依赖 debug_info 块中存储的 Data ，因为它是不透明的，并且随时可能更改。 no_debug_info 表示存在块 "Dbgi" ，但为空。

trans-unit.source: Developers should rely on stacktrace entries only for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员应该只依靠堆栈跟踪条目来进行调试。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer GUI version.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer GUI版本。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer can also be used directly from Erlang. See dialyzer(3).
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer也可以直接从Erlang使用。参见 dialyzer(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer can be called from the command line, from Erlang, and from a GUI.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer可以从命令行、Erlang和GUI中调用。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer can be used directly from Erlang. Both the GUI and the command-line versions are also available. The options are similar to the ones given from the command line, see section Using Dialyzer from the Command Line.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer可以直接从Erlang使用。GUI和命令行版本也都可用。这些选项与从命令行给出的选项相似，请参阅从命令行 Using Dialyzer from the Command Line 部分。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer command-line version.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer命令行版本。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer has a command-line version for automated use. See dialyzer(3).
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer具有可自动使用的命令行版本。参见 dialyzer(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer has a command-line version for automated use. This section provides a brief description of the options. The same information can be obtained by writing the following in a shell:
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer有一个自动使用的命令行版本。本节提供了选项的简要说明。同样的信息可以通过在shell中编写以下内容来获得。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer has two analysis modes: "Byte Code" and "Source Code". They are controlled by the buttons in the top-middle part of the main window, under Analysis Options.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer具有两种分析模式：“字节码”和“源代码”。它们由“ 分析选项”下主窗口中上部的按钮控制。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer is a static analysis tool that identifies software discrepancies, such as definite type errors, code that has become dead or unreachable because of programming error, and unnecessary tests, in single Erlang modules or entire (sets of) applications.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer是一个静态分析工具,它可以识别单个Erlang模块或整个(一组)应用程序中的软件差异,如确定类型错误、因编程错误而导致的代码死机或无法访问、不必要的测试等。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer looks if there is an environment variable called DIALYZER_PLT and places the PLT at this location. If no such variable is set, Dialyzer places the PLT at $HOME/.dialyzer_plt. The placement can also be specified using the options --plt or --output_plt.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer查找是否有一个名为 DIALYZER_PLT 的环境变量，并将PLT放在此位置。如果未设置此类变量，则 $HOME/.dialyzer_plt PLT放在$ HOME / .dialyzer_plt中。也可以使用 --plt 或 --output_plt 选项指定放置位置。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer starts its analysis from either debug-compiled BEAM bytecode or from Erlang source code. The file and line number of a discrepancy is reported along with an indication of what the discrepancy is about. Dialyzer bases its analysis on the concept of success typings, which allows for sound warnings (no false positives).
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer从调试编译的BEAM字节码或Erlang源代码开始分析。差异的文件和行号会被报告,同时也会指出差异的原因。Dialyzer的分析基于成功类型的概念,它允许合理的警告(没有误报)。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer stores the information of the analyzed functions in a Persistent Lookup Table (PLT), see section The Persistent Lookup Table.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer将分析后的功能的信息存储在持久查询表（PLT）中，请参阅 The Persistent Lookup Table 。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer stores the result of an analysis in a Persistent Lookup Table (PLT). The PLT can then be used as a starting point for later analyses. It is recommended to build a PLT with the Erlang/OTP applications that you are using, but also to include your own applications that you are using frequently.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer将分析结果存储在一个持久性查找表(PLT)中。然后PLT可以作为以后分析的起点。我们建议用你正在使用的Erlang/OTP应用程序来建立一个PLT,但也可以包括你自己经常使用的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer then reanalyzes the changed files and the files that depend on these files. Notice that this consistency check is performed automatically the next time you run Dialyzer with this PLT. Option --check_plt is only for doing so without doing any other analysis.
trans-unit.target: 然后，Dialyzer重新分析更改的文件以及依赖于这些文件的文件。请注意，下次使用此PLT运行Dialyzer时，将自动执行此一致性检查。选项 --check_plt 仅用于执行此操作，而无需执行任何其他分析。

trans-unit.source: Dialyzer, a DIscrepancy AnaLYZer for ERlang programs.
trans-unit.target: Dialyzer,一个用于ERlang程序的DIscrepancy AnaLYZer。

trans-unit.source: Dictionary module generation also results in a hrl file that defines records for the messages and Grouped AVPs defined by the dictionary, these records being what a user of the diameter application sends and receives, modulo other possible formats as discussed in diameter_app(3). These records and the underlying Erlang data types corresponding to Diameter data formats are discussed in MESSAGE RECORDS and DATA TYPES respectively. The generated hrl also contains macro definitions for the possible values of AVPs of type Enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 字典模块的生成还会生成一个hrl文件，该文件定义消息的记录和由字典定义的分组AVP，这些记录是直径应用程序的用户发送和接收的内容，以 diameter_app(3) 讨论的其他可能的格式为模。这些记录和与Diameter数据格式对应的基础Erlang数据类型分别在 MESSAGE RECORDS 和 DATA TYPES 中进行了讨论。生成的hrl还包含用于枚举类型的AVP可能值的宏定义。

trans-unit.source: Different databases may also support creating of procedures that contains more than one SQL query. For example, the following SQLServer-specific statement creates a procedure that returns a result set containing information about employees that work at the department and a result set listing the customers of that department.
trans-unit.target: 不同的数据库也可能支持创建包含多个SQL查询的存储过程。例如,下面的SQLServer专用语句创建了一个存储过程,该存储过程返回一个包含在该部门工作的员工信息的结果集和一个列出该部门客户的结果集。

trans-unit.source: Different definitions exist for the week of the year. This module contains a week of the year implementation conforming to the ISO 8601 standard. As the week number for a specified date can fall on the previous, the current, or on the next year, it is important to specify both the year and the week number. Functions iso_week_number/0 and iso_week_number/1 return a tuple of the year and the week number.
trans-unit.target: 一年中的一周存在不同的定义。该模块包含符合ISO 8601标准的一年中的一周实施。由于指定日期的星期数可以落在上一个，当前或下一年，因此指定年号和星期数很重要。函数 iso_week_number/0 和 iso_week_number/1 返回年份和星期数的元组。

trans-unit.source: Different operating systems and tools support different encodings. For example, Linux and MacOS X have chosen the UTF-8 encoding, which is backward compatible with 7-bit ASCII and therefore affects programs written in plain English the least. Windows supports a limited version of UTF-16, namely all the code planes where the characters can be stored in one single 16-bit entity, which includes most living languages.
trans-unit.target: 不同的操作系统和工具支持不同的编码。例如,Linux和MacOS X选择了UTF-8编码,它向后兼容7位ASCII,因此对纯英文编写的程序影响最小。Windows支持UTF-16的有限版本,即所有码面的字符都可以存储在一个16位的实体中,这其中包括大多数活的语言。

trans-unit.source: Different parts of the system will be handled differently regarding compatibility. The following items describe how different parts of the system are handled.
trans-unit.target: 在兼容性方面,系统的不同部分会有不同的处理方式。以下项目描述了如何处理系统的不同部分。

trans-unit.source: Different runtime system instances will use different unspecified points in time as base for their Erlang monotonic clocks. That is, it is pointless comparing monotonic times from different runtime system instances. Different runtime system instances can also place this unspecified point in time different relative runtime system start. It can be placed in the future (time at start is a negative value), the past (time at start is a positive value), or the runtime system start (time at start is zero). The monotonic time at runtime system start can be retrieved by calling erlang:system_info(start_time).
trans-unit.target: 不同的运行时系统实例将使用不同的未指定时间点作为其Erlang单调时钟的基础。也就是说，比较来自不同运行时系统实例的单调时间毫无意义。不同的运行时系统实例也可以将此未指定的时间点设置为不同的相对运行时系统启动时间。可以将其放置在将来（启动时间为负值），过去（启动时间为正值）或运行系统启动时（启动时间为零）。可以通过调用 erlang:system_info(start_time) 来检索运行时系统启动时的单调时间。

trans-unit.source: Different transaction managers employ different strategies to satisfy the isolation property. Mnesia uses the standard technique of two phase locking. That is, locks are set on records before they are read or written. Mnesia uses the following lock types:
trans-unit.target: 不同的事务管理器采用不同的策略来满足隔离属性。 Mnesia 使用两相锁定的标准技术。即，在读取或写入之前在记录上设置了锁定。 Mnesia 使用以下锁定类型：

trans-unit.source: Digraph G is traversed in a breadth-first manner, and the first found path is returned.
trans-unit.target: 以广度优先的方式遍历图 G ，然后返回找到的第一个路径。

trans-unit.source: Digraph G is traversed in a depth-first manner, and the first found path is returned.
trans-unit.target: 以深度优先的方式遍历图 G ，然后返回找到的第一个路径。

trans-unit.source: Digraphs can be annotated with more information. Such information can be attached to the vertices and to the edges of the digraph. An annotated digraph is called a labeled digraph, and the information attached to a vertex or an edge is called a label.
trans-unit.target: 可以用更多信息对图有注释。此类信息可以附加到顶点和图的边缘。带注释的有向图称为带标签的有向图，附着在顶点或边上的信息称为标签。

trans-unit.source: Digraphs can be annotated with more information. Such information can be attached to the vertices and to the edges of the digraph. An annotated digraph is called a labeled digraph, and the information attached to a vertex or an edge is called a label. Labels are Erlang terms.
trans-unit.target: 可以用更多信息对图有注释。此类信息可以附加到顶点和图的边缘。带注释的有向图称为带标签的有向图，附着在顶点或边上的信息称为标签。标签是Erlang术语。

trans-unit.source: Directories containing Erlang modules to be included in a code coverage test must exist in the code server path. Otherwise, the Cover tool fails to recompile the modules. It is not sufficient to specify these directories in the cover specification file for Common Test.
trans-unit.target: 包含在代码覆盖测试中的包含Erlang模块的目录必须存在于代码服务器路径中。否则，Cover工具将无法重新编译模块。在 Common Test 的封面规范文件中指定这些目录是不够的。

trans-unit.source: Directories passed to Common Test can have either relative or absolute paths.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 Common Test 目录可以具有相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.target: 目录 Dir 将添加到代码路径。

trans-unit.target: 目录列表

trans-unit.source: Directory names not starting with / are assumed to be relative the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 不以 / 开头的目录名称被认为是当前工作目录的相对名称。

trans-unit.source: Directory names should not be capitalized.
trans-unit.target: 目录名称不应大写。

trans-unit.target: 假定以 / 开头的目录名称是绝对路径名。

trans-unit.source: Dirty IO schedulers will have scheduler identifiers in the range erlang:system_info(schedulers)+erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers)< SchedulerId =< erlang:system_info(schedulers) + erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) +erlang:system_info(dirty_io_schedulers).
trans-unit.target: 肮脏的IO调度程序将具有 erlang:system_info(schedulers) + erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) < SchedulerId =< erlang:system_info(schedulers) + erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) + erlang:system_info(dirty_io_schedulers) 范围内的调度程序标识符。

trans-unit.source: Dirty NIF support is available only when the emulator is configured with dirty scheduler support. As of ERTS version 9.0, dirty scheduler support is enabled by default on the runtime system with SMP support. The Erlang runtime without SMP support does not support dirty schedulers even when the dirty scheduler support is explicitly enabled. To check at runtime for the presence of dirty scheduler threads, code can use the enif_system_info() API function.
trans-unit.target: 仅当模拟器配置了脏调度程序支持时，脏NIF支持才可用。从ERTS 9.0版开始，默认情况下在具有SMP支持的运行时系统上启用脏调度程序支持。即使明确启用了脏调度程序支持，没有SMP支持的Erlang运行时也不支持脏调度程序。要在运行时检查脏调度程序线程的存在，代码可以使用 enif_system_info() API函数。

trans-unit.source: Dirty operation are often useful, for example, in a datagram routing application where Mnesia stores the routing table, and it is time consuming to start a whole transaction every time a packet is received. Mnesia has therefore functions that manipulate tables without using transactions. This alternative to processing is known as a dirty operation. However, notice the trade-off in avoiding the overhead of transaction processing:
trans-unit.target: 脏操作通常很有用，例如，在 Mnesia 存储路由表的数据报路由应用中，每次接收到数据包时启动整个事务都是很耗时的。因此， Mnesia 具有无需使用事务即可操纵表的功能。这种处理的替代方法称为脏操作。但是，请注意要在避免事务处理开销方面进行权衡：

trans-unit.source: Dirty operations
trans-unit.target: 肮脏的行动

trans-unit.source: Dirty operations always contain only one update and thus no activity event is sent.
trans-unit.target: 脏操作总是只包含一次更新,因此不会发送活动事件。

trans-unit.source: Dirty operations are written to disc if they are performed on a table of type disc_copies or type disc_only_copies. Mnesia also ensures that all replicas of a table are updated if a dirty write operation is performed on a table.
trans-unit.target: 如果对类型 disc_copies 或 disc_only_copies 的表执行了脏操作，则会将它们写入磁盘。如果对表执行了脏写入操作， Mnesia 还确保更新表的所有副本。

trans-unit.source: Disables optimization that can malfunction if "Special start-of-pattern items" are present in the regular expression. A typical example would be when matching "DEFABC" against "(*COMMIT)ABC", where the start optimization of PCRE would skip the subject up to "A" and never realize that the (*COMMIT) instruction is to have made the matching fail. This option is only relevant if you use "start-of-pattern items", as discussed in section PCRE Regular Expression Details.
trans-unit.target: 禁用如果正则表达式中存在“特殊模式开始项”的优化可能会出错。一个典型的例子是将“ DEFABC”与“（* COMMIT）ABC”进行匹配时，PCRE的开始优化将使主体跳过到“ A”，而永远不会意识到（* COMMIT）指令已经进行了匹配失败。如“ PCRE Regular Expression Details 部分中所述，仅当您使用“模式开始项”时，此选项才相关。

trans-unit.source: Disabling arity checks affects the form of messages at encode/decode. In particular, decoded AVPs are represented as lists of values, regardless of the AVP's arity (ie. expected number in the message/AVP grammar in question), and values are expected to be supplied as lists at encode. This differs from the historic decode behaviour of representing AVPs of arity 1 as bare values, not wrapped in a list.
trans-unit.target: 禁用arity检查会影响编码/解码时的消息形式。特别是,解码后的AVP被表示为值的列表,而不管AVP的arity(即在有关的消息/AVP语法中的预期数字),并且在编码时,值被期望作为列表提供。这不同于历史上的解码行为,即把arity 1的AVP表示为裸值,而不是包裹在一个列表中。

trans-unit.source: Disabling counters is a performance improvement, but means that the omitted counters are not returned by service_info/2.

trans-unit.source: Distributes the value X over the unary functions in the list, turning them into nullary test functions. An AbstractTestFun is like an ordinary test fun, but takes one argument instead of zero - it's basically missing some information before it can be a proper test. In practice, {with, X, [F_1, ..., F_N]} is equivalent to [fun () -> F_1(X) end, ..., fun () -> F_N(X) end]. This is particularly useful if your abstract test functions are already implemented as proper functions: {with, FD, [fun filetest_a/1, fun filetest_b/1, fun filetest_c/1]} is equivalent to [fun () -> filetest_a(FD) end, fun () -> filetest_b(FD) end, fun () -> filetest_c(FD) end], but much more compact. See also Fixtures, below.
trans-unit.target: 将值 X 分布在列表中的一元函数上，将它们转换为零值测试函数。一个 AbstractTestFun 就像是一个普通的测试好玩，但需要一个参数，而不是零-它基本上缺少一些信息之前，它可以是一个适当的测试。实际上， {with, X, [F_1, ..., F_N]} 等效于 [fun () -> F_1(X) end, ..., fun () -> F_N(X) end] 。如果您的抽象测试功能已经实现为适当的功能，则此功能特别有用： {with, FD, [fun filetest_a/1, fun filetest_b/1, fun filetest_c/1]} 等效于 [fun () -> filetest_a(FD) end, fun () -> filetest_b(FD) end, fun () -> filetest_c(FD) end] ，但紧凑得多。也可以看看 Fixtures ，如下。

trans-unit.source: Distribution and fault tolerance
trans-unit.target: 分布和容错

trans-unit.source: Distribution of applications is highly dependent of the global group definitions. It is not recommended that an application is distributed over many global groups, as the registered names can be moved to another global group at failover/takeover. Nothing prevents this to be done, but the application code must then handle the situation.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的分布高度依赖于全局组定义。不建议将一个应用程序分布在许多全局组上,因为注册的名称可以在故障切换/接管时转移到另一个全局组。没有什么可以阻止这样做,但应用程序代码必须处理这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Distribution over TLS/SSL, See the Using SSL for Erlang Distribution User's Guide for details on how to setup a secure distributed node.
trans-unit.target: 通过TLS / SSL Using SSL for Erlang Distribution ，有关如何设置安全的分布式节点的详细信息，请参见《将SSL用于Erlang分发用户指南》。

trans-unit.source: Do not declare the driver_entryconst. This because the emulator must modify the handle and the handle2 fields. A statically allocated, and const-declared driver_entry can be located in read-only memory, which causes the emulator to crash.
trans-unit.target: 不要不声明 driver_entry const 。这是因为仿真器必须修改 handle 和 handle2 字段。可以将静态分配的且由 const 声明的 driver_entry 放置在只读内存中，这将导致模拟器崩溃。
