trans-unit.source: Do not assume that the fastest implementation of a given algorithm on computer architecture X is also the fastest on computer architecture Y.

trans-unit.target: 不要从 erlang 模块自动导入任何功能。

trans-unit.source: Do not break Hangul (a Korean script) syllable sequences. Hangul characters are of five types: L, V, T, LV, and LVT. An L character can be followed by an L, V, LV, or LVT character. An LV or V character can be followed by a V or T character. An LVT or T character can be followed only by a T character.
trans-unit.target: 不要破坏韩文的音节序列。韩文字符有五种类型。L、V、T、LV、LVT。一个L字后面可以跟一个L、V、LV或LVT字。一个LV或V字符后面可以跟一个V或T字符,一个LVT或T字符后面可以跟一个L、V、LV或LVT字符。LVT 或 T 字符后面只能跟一个 T 字符。

trans-unit.source: Do not compile (that is, do not produce object code) the generated .erl file. If this option is omitted, the generated Erlang module is compiled.
trans-unit.target: 不要编译（即不产生目标代码）生成的 .erl 文件。如果省略此选项，则编译生成的Erlang模块。

trans-unit.source: Do not confuse item (?R) with condition (R), which tests for recursion. Consider the following pattern, which matches text in angle brackets, allowing for arbitrary nesting. Only digits are allowed in nested brackets (that is, when recursing), while any characters are permitted at the outer level.
trans-unit.target: 不要将项(?R)与条件(R)混淆,后者测试递归。考虑以下模式,它匹配角括号中的文本,允许任意嵌套。嵌套括号中只允许有数字(即递归时),而在外层允许有任何字符。

trans-unit.source: Do not confuse this feature with the repeat property of a test case group. The options described here are used to repeat execution of entire test runs, while the repeat property of a test case group makes it possible to repeat execution of sets of test cases within a suite. For more information about the latter, see section Test Case Groups in section Writing Test Suites.
trans-unit.target: 请勿将此功能与测试用例组的 repeat 属性混淆。此处描述的选项用于重复执行整个测试运行，而测试用例组的 repeat 属性使在套件中重复执行一组测试用例成为可能。有关后者的更多信息，请参见“ 编写测试套件”一节中的“测试用例 Test Case Groups 一节。

trans-unit.source: Do not depend on the current working directory for reading and writing data files, as this is not portable. All scratch files are to be written in the priv_dir and all data files are to be located in data_dir. Also, the Common Test server sets the current working directory to the test case log directory at the start of every case.
trans-unit.target: 请勿依赖当前工作目录来读写数据文件，因为这是不可移植的。所有暂存文件都将写入 priv_dir 中，所有数据文件都将位于 data_dir 中。此外， Common Test 服务器在每个案例的开头都将当前工作目录设置为测试案例日志目录。

trans-unit.source: Do not depend on the scheduling to remain exactly as it is today. Scheduling is likely to be changed in a future release to use available processor cores better.
trans-unit.target: 不要依赖调度完全保持现在的状态。在未来的版本中,为了更好地使用可用的处理器内核,调度很可能会被改变。

trans-unit.source: Do not disable the Erlang shell while running the GUI.
trans-unit.target: 不要在运行GUI时禁用Erlang shell。

trans-unit.source: Do not enable parallel_logins without protecting the server by other means, for example, by the max_sessions option or a firewall configuration. If set to true, there is no protection against DOS attacks.
trans-unit.target: 在未通过其他方式（例如通过 max_sessions 选项或防火墙配置）保护服务器的情况下，请勿启用 parallel_logins 。如果设置为 true ，则没有针对DOS攻击的保护措施。

trans-unit.source: Do not end after prepend characters.
trans-unit.target: 不要在前缀字符后结束。

trans-unit.source: Do not end before extending characters or spacing marks. Characters with the "mark" property always have the "extend" grapheme breaking property.
trans-unit.target: 在扩展字符或间隔标记之前不要结束。具有 "标记 "属性的字符总是具有 "扩展 "字形断句属性。

trans-unit.source: Do not end between CR and LF; otherwise end after any control character.
trans-unit.target: 不要在CR和LF之间结束,否则在任何控制字符之后结束。

trans-unit.source: Do not fetch data that you already have.
trans-unit.target: 不要获取你已经拥有的数据。

trans-unit.source: Do not forget to consider the burst rate. If you set intensity to 1 and period to 6, it gives the same sustained error rate as 5/30 or 10/60, but will not allow even 2 restart attempts in quick succession. This is probably not what you wanted.
trans-unit.target: 不要忘记考虑突发率。如果您将强度设置为1,周期设置为6,它提供的持续错误率与5/30或10/60相同,但甚至不允许快速连续2次重启尝试。这可能不是你想要的。

trans-unit.source: Do not rely too much on the order of Flag atoms or Ifopt tuples. There are however some rules:
trans-unit.target: 不要过分依赖 Flag 原子或 Ifopt 元组的顺序。但是，有一些规则：

trans-unit.source: Do not segment outgoing reply messages. This is useful when either it is known that messages are never to large or that the transport protocol can handle such things on its own (e.g. TCP or SCTP).
trans-unit.target: 不要对发送的回复信息进行分割。当知道消息不会太大,或者传输协议可以自行处理这些事情时(如TCP或SCTP),这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Do not send messages or issue port commands to the Tracee in any of the callbacks. This is not allowed and can cause all sorts of strange behavior, including, but not limited to, infinite recursions.
trans-unit.target: 不要在任何回调中向 Tracee 发送消息或发出端口命令。这是不允许的，并且可能导致各种奇怪的行为，包括但不限于无限递归。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the period to a very high value if you want to tolerate bursts. If you set intensity to 5 and period to 3600 (one hour), the supervisor will allow a short burst of 5 restarts, but then gives up if it sees another single restart almost an hour later. You probably want to regard those crashes as separate incidents, so setting the period to 5 or 10 minutes will be more reasonable.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想容忍突发事件,不要把周期设置得很高。如果你将强度设置为5,周期设置为3600(一小时),那么主管会允许5次重启的短暂爆发,但如果它在近一小时后看到另一次单次重启,就会放弃。你可能想将这些崩溃事件视为单独的事件,所以将周期设置为5或10分钟会更合理。

trans-unit.source: Do not tamper with the socket options list, binary, active, packet, nodelay and deliver since they are used by the distribution protocol handler itself. Other raw socket options such as packet_size may interfere severely, so beware!
trans-unit.target: 不要与套接字选项篡改 list ， binary ， active ， packet ， nodelay 和 deliver ，因为它们是由分配协议处理程序本身使用。其他原始套接字选项（例如 packet_size )可能会严重干扰，因此请注意！

trans-unit.source: Do not try to work around these problems by using alternative implementations of the missing algorithms! An application can only claim to be using a FIPS 140-2 validated cryptographic module if it uses it exclusively for every cryptographic operation.
trans-unit.target: 不要试图通过使用缺失算法的替代实现来解决这些问题! 一个应用程序只能声称使用FIPS 140-2验证的加密模块,如果它只用于每个加密操作。

trans-unit.source: Do not use a Context as argument in more than one call to hmac_update or hmac_final. The semantics of reusing old contexts in any way is undefined and could even crash the VM in earlier releases. The reason for this limitation is a lack of support in the underlying OpenSSL API.
trans-unit.target: 在多次调用hmac_update或hmac_final时，请勿将 Context 用作参数。以任何方式重用旧上下文的语义是不确定的，甚至可能使早期版本的VM崩溃。出现此限制的原因是基础OpenSSL API中缺少支持。

trans-unit.source: Do not use any of the keys in these examples. Use your own keys.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用这些例子中的任何键。请使用你自己的钥匙。

trans-unit.source: Do not use atom cache over this connection.
trans-unit.target: 不要在这个连接上使用原子缓存。

trans-unit.source: Do recover from a testcase failure using CTHs only a last resort. If used wrongly, it can be very difficult to determine which tests that pass or fail in a test run.
trans-unit.target: 使用CTHs从测试用例失败中恢复只是最后的手段。如果使用不当,就很难确定测试运行中哪些测试通过或失败。

trans-unit.source: Does this mean that 3 is in inches? Or does it mean that 3 is in centimeters and is to be converted to inches? Erlang has a way to group things together to make things more understandable. These are called tuples and are surrounded by curly brackets, "{" and "}".
trans-unit.target: 这是否意味着3英寸？还是说3以厘米为单位，并将其转换为英寸？Erlang有一种将事物组合在一起的方法，使事物更易于理解。这些称为元组，并用大括号“ {”和“}”包围。

trans-unit.source: Doing ./otp_build save_bootstrap from the $ERL_TOP directory before doing make clean will ensure that it will be possible to build after doing make clean. ./otp_build save_bootstrap will be invoked automatically when make is invoked from $ERL_TOP with either the clean target, or the default target. It is also automatically invoked if ./otp_build remove_prebuilt_files is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在进行 make clean 之前从 $ERL_TOP 目录执行 ./otp_build save_bootstrap 将确保在进行 make clean 之后可以进行构建。从 $ERL_TOP 使用 clean 目标或默认目标调用 make 时，。/ ./otp_build save_bootstrap 将自动被调用。如果调用 ./otp_build remove_prebuilt_files ,也会自动调用它。

trans-unit.source: Doing make clean in an arbitrary directory of the source tree, may remove files needed for bootstrapping the build.
trans-unit.target: 这样做 make clean 源树的任意目录中，可能会删除需要提供引导构建文件。

trans-unit.source: Doing too much work in each NIF call will degrade responsiveness of the VM. Doing too little work may mean that the gain of the faster processing in the NIF is eaten up by the overhead of calling the NIF and checking the arguments.

trans-unit.target: 放弃使用latin1原子编码,无条件地对所有原子使用utf8编码。这将在未来的 Erlang/OTP 主要版本中被改为默认。从 R16B 开始,Erlang/OTP 系统可以解码这种表示方式。

trans-unit.source: Due to a known bug in the underlying zlib library, WindowBits values 8 and -8 do not work as expected. In zlib versions before 1.2.9 values 8 and -8 are automatically changed to 9 and -9. From zlib version 1.2.9 value -8 is rejected causing zlib:deflateInit/6 to fail (8 is still changed to 9). It also seem possible that future versions of zlib may fix this bug and start accepting 8 and -8 as is.
trans-unit.target: 由于基础zlib库中存在一个已知的错误， WindowBits 值8和-8不能按预期方式工作。在1.2.9之前的zlib版本中，值8和-8会自动更改为9和-9。从zlib版本1.2.9开始，拒绝值-8，从而导致 zlib:deflateInit/6 失败（8仍更改为9）。 zlib的未来版本似乎也可能会修复此错误，并按原样开始接受8和-8。

trans-unit.source: During execution of tests started with ct:run_test/1, the Erlang shell process, controlling stdin, remains the top-level process of the Common Test system of processes. Consequently, the Erlang shell is not available for interaction during the test run. If this is not desirable, for example, because the shell is needed for debugging purposes or for interaction with the SUT during test execution, set start option release_shell to true (in the call to ct:run_test/1 or by using the corresponding test specification term, described later). This makes Common Test release the shell immediately after the test suite compilation stage. To accomplish this, a test runner process is spawned to take control of the test execution. The effect is that ct:run_test/1 returns the pid of this process rather than the test result, which instead is printed to tty at the end of the test run.
trans-unit.target: 在执行以 ct:run_test/1 开头的测试期间，控制 stdin 的Erlang Shell进程仍然是 Common Test 系统的顶级进程。因此，Erlang Shell在测试运行期间不可用于交互。例如，如果这不是理想的，则因为需要Shell来进行调试或在测试执行过程中与SUT进行交互，请将启动选项 release_shell 设置为 true （在 ct:run_test/1 调用中或使用相应的测试规范）字词，稍后说明）。这使 Common Test 在测试套件编译阶段之后立即释放外壳。为此，将生成一个测试运行器进程来控制测试执行。结果是 ct:run_test/1 返回此过程的pid，而不是测试结果，而是在测试运行结束时将其打印到tty。

trans-unit.source: During finalization, the time offset is adjusted and fixed so that current Erlang system time aligns with the current OS system time. As the time offset can change during the finalization, Erlang system time can do a time warp at this point. The time offset is from now on fixed until the runtime system terminates. If time correction has been enabled, the time correction from now on also makes adjustments to align Erlang system time with OS system time. When the system is in the final phase, it behaves exactly as in no time warp mode.
trans-unit.target: 在完成过程中，将调整并固定时间偏移，以使当前的Erlang系统时间与当前的OS系统时间保持一致。由于时间偏移可以在最终确定期间更改，因此Erlang系统时间可以在此时进行时间扭曲。从现在开始，时间偏移是固定的，直到运行系统终止。如果启用了时间校正，则从现在开始的时间校正还将进行调整，以使Erlang系统时间与OS系统时间对齐。当系统处于最后阶段时，它的行为与 no time warp mode 行为完全相同。

trans-unit.source: During high load scenarios, the length of the handler message queue rarely grows in a linear and predictable way. Instead, whenever the handler process is scheduled in, it can have an almost arbitrary number of messages waiting in the message queue. It is for this reason that the overload protection mechanism is focused on acting quickly, and quite drastically, such as immediately dropping or flushing messages, when a large queue length is detected.
trans-unit.target: 在高负载情况下,处理程序消息队列的长度很少以线性和可预测的方式增长。相反,每当处理程序进程排入时,它的消息队列中可能有几乎任意数量的消息在等待。正是由于这个原因,过载保护机制的重点是在检测到队列长度过大时,迅速采取行动,而且是相当剧烈的行动,比如立即丢弃或冲刷消息。

trans-unit.source: During model testing, the first test results in {badmatch,16} in {toy,start,1}, why?
trans-unit.target: 在模型测试期间，第一个测试在 {toy,start,1} 中的 {badmatch,16} 中产生结果，为什么？

trans-unit.source: During release handling, non-affected processes continue normal execution. This can lead to time-outs or other problems. For example, new processes created in the time window between suspending processes using a certain module, and loading a new version of this module, can execute old code.
trans-unit.target: 在释放处理过程中,不受影响的进程继续正常执行。这可能导致超时或其他问题。例如,在暂停使用某个模块的进程和加载这个模块的新版本之间的时间窗口中创建的新进程,会执行旧的代码。

trans-unit.source: During runtime, Logger configuration is changed via API functions. See section Configuration API Functions in the logger(3) manual page.
trans-unit.target: 在运行期间，通过API函数更改Logger的配置。请参阅 logger(3) 手册页中的“ Configuration API Functions 部分。

trans-unit.source: During the start of a system, when a client application could start prior to the SNMP manager but is dependent upon it, and therefor has to wait for it to start.
trans-unit.target: 在系统启动过程中，客户端应用程序可以在SNMP管理器之前启动但依赖于它，因此必须等待它启动。

trans-unit.source: During use of a port opened using {spawn, Name}, {spawn_driver, Name}, or {spawn_executable, Name}, errors arising when sending messages to it are reported to the owning process using signals of the form {'EXIT', Port, PosixCode}. For the possible values of PosixCode, see file(3).
trans-unit.target: 在使用通过 {spawn, Name} ， {spawn_driver, Name} 或 {spawn_executable, Name} 打开的端口的过程中，向其发送消息时出现的错误将使用 {'EXIT', Port, PosixCode} 形式的信号报告给拥有进程，PosixCode}。有关 PosixCode 的可能值，请参见 file(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic Erlang Driver Linking
trans-unit.target: 动态Erlang驱动链接

trans-unit.source: Dynamic driver loader and linker.
trans-unit.target: 动态驱动程序加载器和链接器。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic reconfiguration
trans-unit.target: 动态重新配置

trans-unit.source: Dynamic version detection
trans-unit.target: 动态版本检测

trans-unit.source: Dynamically adds a child specification to supervisor SupRef, which starts the corresponding child process.
trans-unit.target: 动态地将子规范添加到主管 SupRef ，该规范启动相应的子进程。

trans-unit.source: Dynamically loaded into the Erlang machines address space, which is the only alternative if a precompiled version of Erlang is to be used
trans-unit.target: 动态加载到Erlang机器的地址空间,如果要使用Erlang的预编译版本,这是唯一的选择。

trans-unit.source: Dynamically started services are not handled by application takeover and failover behavior when Inets is run as a distributed application. Nor are they automatically restarted when the Inets application is restarted. As long as the Inets application is operational, they are supervised and can be soft code upgraded.
trans-unit.target: 当 Inets 作为分布式应用程序运行时，应用程序的接管和故障转移行为不会处理动态启动的服务。重新启动 Inets 应用程序时，它们也不会自动重新启动。只要 Inets 应用程序可运行，就可以对其进行监督并可以对其进行软代码升级。

trans-unit.source: Dynamically starts an FTP session after the ftp application has been started.
trans-unit.target: 启动 ftp 应用程序后，动态启动 FTP 会话。

trans-unit.source: Dynamically starts an Inets service after the Inets application has been started.
trans-unit.target: 在启动 Inets 应用程序后动态启动 Inets 服务。

trans-unit.source: Dynamically updates the compression level and compression strategy. The interpretation of Level and Strategy is as in deflateInit/6. This can be used to switch between compression and straight copy of the input data, or to switch to a different kind of input data requiring a different strategy. If the compression level is changed, the input available so far is compressed with the old level (and can be flushed); the new level takes effect only at the next call of deflate/3.
trans-unit.target: 动态更新压缩级别和压缩策略。的解释 Level 和 Strategy 是在 deflateInit/6 。这可用于在压缩和直接复制输入数据之间切换，或切换到需要不同策略的另一种输入数据。如果更改了压缩级别，那么到目前为止可用的输入将使用旧级别进行压缩（并且可以刷新）；新级别仅在下一次调用 deflate/3 时生效。

trans-unit.source: EEP 40 suggests that the language is also to allow for Unicode characters > 255 in variable names. Whether to implement that EEP is yet to be decided.
trans-unit.target: EEP 40建议该语言还应允许变量名中的Unicode字符> 255。是否实施该EEP尚待确定。

trans-unit.target: 高铁计划

trans-unit.target: ERTS

trans-unit.source: ERTS 5.9 introduced two new integer types, ErlDrvSizeT and ErlDrvSSizeT, which can hold 64-bit sizes if necessary.
trans-unit.target: ERTS 5.9引入了两个新的整数类型 ErlDrvSizeT 和 ErlDrvSSizeT ，如果需要，它们可以容纳64位大小。

trans-unit.target: ERTS用户指南

trans-unit.source: ERTS version the release is intended for.
trans-unit.target: ERTS版本的发行对象。

trans-unit.target: ERTS/erl_driver

trans-unit.source: ETS
trans-unit.target: ETS

trans-unit.source: ETS match specifications produce a return value. Usually the MatchBody contains one single ConditionExpression that defines the return value without any side effects. Calls with side effects are not allowed in the ETS context.
trans-unit.target: ETS匹配规范产生一个返回值。通常， MatchBody 包含一个单独的 ConditionExpression ，它定义了返回值而没有任何副作用。ETS上下文中不允许有副作用的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: EUnit builds on ideas from the family of unit testing frameworks for Object Oriented languages that originated with JUnit by Beck and Gamma (and Beck's previous framework SUnit for Smalltalk). However, EUnit uses techniques more adapted to functional and concurrent programming, and is typically less verbose than its relatives.
trans-unit.target: EUnit建立在面向对象语言的单元测试框架家族的基础上,该框架起源于Beck和Gamma的JUnit(以及Beck之前的Smalltalk框架SUnit)。然而,EUnit使用的技术更适合于函数式和并发编程,并且通常比它的亲戚们更不啰嗦。

trans-unit.source: EUnit is a unit testing framework for Erlang. It is very powerful and flexible, is easy to use, and has small syntactical overhead.
trans-unit.target: EUnit是一个针对Erlang的单元测试框架。它的功能非常强大和灵活,易于使用,并且语法开销小。

trans-unit.source: EVAL Scheme
trans-unit.target: EVAL计划

trans-unit.source: EXPERIMENTAL support in Common Test for calling property-based tests.
trans-unit.target: Common Test 实验支持，用于调用基于属性的测试。

trans-unit.source: EXPERIMENTAL support in Common Test for calling property-based tests.
trans-unit.target: 在Common Test中支持调用基于属性的测试。

trans-unit.source: Each -spec contract is to be a subtype of the respective -callback contract.
trans-unit.target: 每个 -spec 合同是成为各自的子类型 -callback 合同。

trans-unit.source: Each cycle is included in some strongly connected component, which implies that a topological ordering of the created digraph always exists.
trans-unit.target: 每个 cycle 都包含在一些紧密连接的组件中，这意味着创建的有向图的 topological ordering 始终存在。

trans-unit.source: Each user of the driver use literally the same pathname for the driver when demanding load, but the users are not concerned with if the driver is already loaded from the file system or if the object code must be loaded from file system.
trans-unit.target: 当要求加载时，驱动程序的每个 user 在字面上使用相同的驱动程序路径名，但是 users 并不关心驱动程序是否已从文件系统加载，或者目标代码是否必须从文件系统加载。

trans-unit.source: Each Application (atom) and AppVsn is the name and version of an application included in the release. The minimal release based on Erlang/OTP consists of the Kernel and STDLIB applications, so these applications must be included in the list.
trans-unit.target: 每个 Application （原子）和 AppVsn 是发行版中包含的应用程序的名称和版本。基于Erlang / OTP的最低版本包含内核和STDLIB应用程序，因此这些应用程序必须包含在列表中。

trans-unit.source: Each DownToVsn is a previous version of the application to downgrade to.
trans-unit.target: 每个 DownToVsn 是要降级到的应用程序的先前版本。

trans-unit.source: Each Instructions is a list of release handling instructions.
trans-unit.target: 每个 Instructions 都是发行处理说明的列表。

trans-unit.source: Each Opt is a tuple {Key,Value}, which define a certain property of the application. All keys are optional. Default values are used for any omitted keys.
trans-unit.target: 每个 Opt 是一个元组 {Key,Value} ，它们定义了应用程序的某个属性。所有键都是可选的。默认值用于任何省略的键。

trans-unit.source: Each UpFromVsn is a previous version of the application to upgrade from.
trans-unit.target: 每个 UpFromVsn 是要从其升级的应用程序的先前版本。

trans-unit.source: Each declaration or rule ends with a dot (the character '.').
trans-unit.target: 每个 declaration 或 rule 以点（字符 '.' ）结尾。

trans-unit.source: Each vacmViewTreeFamilyViewName refers to a collection of sub-trees.
trans-unit.target: 每个 vacmViewTreeFamilyViewName 都引用子树的集合。

trans-unit.source: Each CPU will be specified separately (assuming this information can be retrieved from the operating system), that is, a list with one UtilDesc per CPU will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 将单独指定每个CPU（假定可以从操作系统中检索此信息），即，将返回每个CPU 具有一个 UtilDesc 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Each Diameter application defined on a service is configured with a callback module that implements the application interface through which diameter communicates the connectivity of remote peers, requests peer selection for outgoing requests, and communicates the reception of incoming Diameter request and answer messages. An application using diameter implements these application callback modules to provide the functionality of the Diameter node(s) it implements.
trans-unit.target: 在服务上定义的每个Diameter应用程序都配置有一个回调模块，该回调模块实现 application interface ，直径通过该接口传达远程对等方的连接，为输出请求请求对等方选择并传达对传入Diameter请求和应答消息的接收。使用直径的应用程序实现这些应用程序回调模块，以提供其实现的Diameter节点的功能。

trans-unit.source: Each Diameter application is also configured with a dictionary module that provide encode/decode functionality for outgoing/incoming Diameter messages belonging to the application. A dictionary module is generated from a dictionary file using the diameterc utility. Dictionaries for the RFC 6733 Diameter Common Messages, Base Accounting and Relay applications are provided with the diameter application.
trans-unit.target: 每个Diameter应用程序还配置有词典模块，该模块为属于该应用程序的传出/传入Diameter消息提供编码/解码功能。使用 diameterc 实用程序从 dictionary file 生成词典模块。直径应用程序提供了RFC 6733直径常用消息，基本核算和中继应用程序的字典。

trans-unit.source: Each Logger handler has a configured formatter specified as a module and a configuration term. The purpose of the formatter is to translate the log events to a final printable string (unicode:chardata()) which can be written to the output device of the handler. See sections Handlers and Formatters in the Kernel User's Guide for more information.
trans-unit.target: 每个Logger处理程序都有一个指定为模块的配置格式器和一个配置项。格式化程序的目的是将日志事件转换为最终可打印的字符串（ unicode:chardata() ），该字符串可写入处理程序的输出设备。有关更多信息，请参见《内核用户指南》中的“ Handlers 和 Formatters 程序”部分。

trans-unit.source: Each MIB is contained in one application. The MIB text files are stored under mibs/<MIB>.mib in the application directory. The generated .hrl files with constant declarations are stored under include/<MIB>.hrl, and the compiled MIBs are stored under priv/mibs/<MIB>.bin. For example, the OTP-MIB is included in the SASL application:
trans-unit.target: 每个MIB都包含在一个应用程序中。MIB文本文件存储在应用程序目录中的 mibs/<MIB>.mib 下。生成的带有常量声明的 .hrl 文件存储在 include/<MIB>.hrl 下，编译后的MIB存储在 priv/mibs/<MIB>.bin 下。例如， OTP-MIB 包含在SASL应用程序中：

trans-unit.source: Each OAM component in OTP is implemented as one sub-application, which can be included in a management application for the system. Notice that such a complete management application is not in the scope of this generic functionality. However, this section includes examples illustrating how such an application can be built.
trans-unit.target: OTP中的每个OAM组件都是作为一个子应用来实现的,它可以包含在系统的管理应用中。注意,这样一个完整的管理应用程序不在本通用功能的范围内。但是,本节包括了一些例子来说明如何建立这样的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Each Object Identifier (OID) is made up of a table name and a key. For example, if an employee record is represented by the tuple {employee, 104732, klacke, 7, male, 98108, {221, 015}}, this record has an OID, which is the tuple {employee, 104732}.
trans-unit.target: 每个对象标识符（OID）由一个表名和一个键组成。例如，如果员工记录由元组 {employee, 104732, klacke, 7, male, 98108, {221, 015}} ，则该记录具有一个OID，即元组 {employee, 104732} 。

trans-unit.source: Each Xref server is referred to by a unique name. The name is given when creating the server:
trans-unit.target: 每个Xref服务器都有一个独特的名称。该名称是在创建服务器时给出的。

trans-unit.source: Each breakpoint has a trigger action that specifies what is to happen when a process has reached it (and stopped):
trans-unit.target: 每个断点都有一个触发动作，该动作指定一个进程到达（并停止）该进程时将发生的情况：

trans-unit.source: Each certificate in the certificate chain is issued by the previous one.
trans-unit.target: 证书链中的每一张证书都是由前一张证书签发的。

trans-unit.source: Each channel is an isolated "pipe" between a client-side process and a server-side process. Thoose process pairs could handle for example file transfers (sftp) or remote command execution (shell, exec and/or cli). If a custom shell is implemented, the user of the client could execute the special commands remotely. Note that the user is not necessarily a human but probably a system interfacing the SSH app.
trans-unit.target: 每个通道都是客户端进程和服务器端进程之间的一个孤立的 "管道"。这些进程对可以处理文件传输(sftp)或远程命令执行(shell,exec和/或cli)。如果实现了一个自定义的shell,客户端的用户可以远程执行特殊的命令。请注意,用户不一定是人,而可能是系统与SSH应用程序的接口。

trans-unit.source: Each character has exactly one Unicode general category property, specified by a two-letter acronym. For compatibility with Perl, negation can be specified by including a circumflex between the opening brace and the property name. For example, \p{^Lu} is the same as \P{Lu}.
trans-unit.target: 每个字符都有一个Unicode通用类别属性,由一个两个字母的缩写来指定。为了与Perl兼容,可以通过在开头括号和属性名之间加入一个圆括号来指定否定。例如,\p{^Lu}与 \P{Lu}是一样的。

trans-unit.source: Each character in the entry's name and value that cannot be expressed using the selected character encoding, is replaced by a string consisting of a U+0026 AMPERSAND character (&), a "#" (U+0023) character, one or more ASCII digits representing the Unicode code point of the character in base ten, and finally a ";" (U+003B) character.
trans-unit.target: 条目名称和值中无法使用所选字符编码表示的每个字符都将替换为由U + 0026 AMPERSAND字符（＆），“＃”（U + 0023）字符，一个或多个ASCII组成的字符串代表该字符的Unicode代码点的数字（以10为底），最后是一个“;” （U + 003B）字符。

trans-unit.source: Each character is stored in one to four bytes depending on code point. The encoding is backward compatible with bytewise representation of 7-bit ASCII, as all 7-bit characters are stored in one single byte in UTF-8. The characters beyond code point 127 are stored in more bytes, letting the most significant bit in the first character indicate a multi-byte character. For details on the encoding, the RFC is publicly available.
trans-unit.target: 每个字符根据码点的不同存储在1到4个字节中。编码向后兼容7位ASCII码的字节表示,因为所有7位字符都存储在UTF-8的一个字节中。代码点127以外的字符则存储在更多的字节中,让第一个字符中最重要的位来表示一个多字节的字符。关于编码的细节,RFC是公开的。

trans-unit.source: Each client and server in Inets is viewed as a service. Services can be configured to be started at application startup or dynamically in runtime. To run Inets as a distributed application that handles application failover and takeover, configure the services to be started at application startup. When starting the Inets application, the Inets top supervisor starts a number of subsupervisors and worker processes for handling the provided services. When starting services dynamically, new children are added to the supervision tree, unless the service is started with the standalone option. In this case the service is linked to the calling process and all OTP application features, such as soft upgrade, are lost.
trans-unit.target: Inets 中的每个客户端和服务器都被视为一项服务。可以将服务配置为在应用程序启动时启动，或者在运行时动态启动。若要将 Inets 作为处理应用程序故障转移和接管的分布式应用程序运行，请配置要在应用程序启动时启动的服务。当启动 Inets 应用程序时， Inets 高级主管将启动许多子主管和工作进程来处理提供的服务。动态启动服务时，新子级将添加到监管树中，除非使用独立选项启动该服务。在这种情况下，服务链接到呼叫过程，并且所有OTP应用程序功能（例如软升级）都将丢失。

trans-unit.source: Each connection may have its own configuration of callback modules, re-send timers, transaction id ranges etc. and they may be re-configured on-the-fly.
trans-unit.target: 每个连接都可能有自己配置的回调模块、重发定时器、交易ID范围等,而且它们可以在现场重新配置。

trans-unit.source: Each directory in the path to the requested asset is searched for an access file (default is .htaccess), which restricts the web servers rights to respond to a request. If an access file is found, the rules in that file is applied to the request.
trans-unit.target: 在所请求资产的路径中的每个目录中搜索访问文件（默认为 .htaccess ），该文件限制了Web服务器响应请求的权限。如果找到了访问文件，则该文件中的规则将应用于请求。

trans-unit.source: Each driver instance is associated with a port. Every port has a port owner process. Communication with the port is normally done through the port owner process. Most of the functions take the port handle as an argument. This identifies the driver instance. Notice that this port handle must be stored by the driver, it is not given when the driver is called from the emulator (see driver_entry).
trans-unit.target: 每个驱动程序实例都与一个端口关联。每个端口都有一个端口所有者进程。与端口的通信通常是通过端口所有者进程完成的。大多数功能都将 port 句柄作为参数。这标识了驱动程序实例。请注意，此端口句柄必须由驱动程序存储，从仿真器调用驱动程序时不提供该端口句柄（请参阅 driver_entry ）。

trans-unit.source: Each element Ei specifies a segment of the bit string. Each element Ei is a value, followed by an optional size expression and an optional type specifier list.
trans-unit.target: 每个元素 Ei 指定位串的一段。每个元素 Ei 是一个值，后跟一个可选的size表达式和一个可选的类型说明符列表。

trans-unit.source: Each element specifies a certain segment of the bitstring. A segment is a set of contiguous bits of the binary (not necessarily on a byte boundary). The first element specifies the initial segment, the second element specifies the following segment, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 每个元素指定位串的特定段。段是二进制文件的一组连续位（不一定在字节边界上）。第一个元素指定初始段，第二个元素指定后续段，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Each employee works on a number of projects, hence the in_proj relationship.
trans-unit.target: 每个员工都从事多个项目，因此 in_proj 关系。

trans-unit.source: Each entry in the resulting list contains the following corresponding information about the program forms:
trans-unit.target: 结果列表中的每个条目都包含以下相应的程序表格信息。

trans-unit.source: Each entry is a term:
trans-unit.target: 每个条目都是一个术语。

trans-unit.source: Each entry is a tuple of size four:
trans-unit.target: 每个条目都是一个大小为4的元组。

trans-unit.source: Each entry is a tuple of size two:
trans-unit.target: 每个条目是一个大小为2的元组。

trans-unit.source: Each entry is a tuple:
trans-unit.target: 每个条目都是一个元组。

trans-unit.source: Each entry is one of the terms, one entry corresponds to one row in one of the tables.
trans-unit.target: 每一个条目是其中的一个术语,一个条目对应其中一个表格中的一行。

trans-unit.source: Each event handler is implemented as a callback module exporting a predefined set of functions. The relationship between the behavior functions and the callback functions is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 每个事件处理程序都是以回调模块的形式实现的,输出一组预定义的函数。行为函数和回调函数之间的关系如下。

trans-unit.source: Each execution of a match specification is done against a match target term. The format and content of the target term depends on the context in which the match is done. The match target for ETS is always a full table tuple. The match target for call trace is always a list of all function arguments. The match target for event trace depends on the event type, see table below.
trans-unit.target: 匹配规范的每一次执行都是针对一个匹配目标项进行的。目标项的格式和内容取决于匹配的上下文。ETS的匹配目标总是一个全表元组。调用跟踪的匹配目标总是所有函数参数的列表。事件跟踪的匹配目标取决于事件类型,见下表。

trans-unit.source: Each field in a record declaration can have an optional, explicit, default initializer expression, and an optional type.
trans-unit.target: 记录声明中的每个字段可以有一个可选的、显式的、默认的初始化表达式,以及一个可选的类型。

trans-unit.source: Each file in the list will be read and processed separately. For every file, each reference to some module M, such that there is an entry {<em>M</em>, <em>M1</em>} in Renamings, will be changed to the corresponding M1. Furthermore, if a file F defines module M, and there is an entry {<em>M</em>, <em>M1</em>} in Renamings, a new file named <em>M1</em>.erl will be created in the same directory as F, containing the source code for module M, renamed to M1. If M does not have an entry in Renamings, the module is not renamed, only updated, and the resulting source code is written to <em>M</em>.erl (typically, this overwrites the original file). The suffix option (see below) can be used to change the default ".erl" suffix for the generated files.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的每个文件将被分别读取和处理。对于每个文件，每个对某个模块M的引用（例如在 Renamings 中都有一个条目 {<em>M</em>, <em>M1</em>} 都将更改为相应的M1。此外，如果文件F定义了模块M，并且在 Renamings 存在条目 {<em>M</em>, <em>M1</em>} ，则新文件名为 <em>M1</em>.erl 将在与F相同的目录中创建，其中包含模块M的源代码，并将其重命名为M1。如果M在 Renamings 中没有条目，则不会重命名该模块，而仅对其进行更新，并且将生成的源代码写入 <em>M</em>.erl （通常，这会覆盖原始文件）。的 suffix 选项（请参见下文）可用于更改生成文件的默认后缀“ .erl ”。

trans-unit.source: Each filter set consists of a log level check, followed by zero or more filter functions.
trans-unit.target: 每个过滤器集都包含一个日志级别检查，然后是零个或多个过滤器功能。

trans-unit.source: Each function takes the argument NameDb, which is a tuple {Name, Db}, to identify which database the functions should use. Name is the symbolic name of the managed object as defined in the MIB, and Db is either volatile, persistent, or mnesia. If it is mnesia, all variables are stored in the Mnesia table snmp_variables which must be a table with two attributes (not a Mnesia SNMP table). The SNMP tables are stored in Mnesia tables with the same names as the SNMP tables. All functions assume that a Mnesia table exists with the correct name and attributes. It is the programmer's responsibility to ensure this. Specifically, if variables are stored in Mnesia, the table snmp_variables must be created by the programmer. The record definition for this table is defined in the file snmp/include/snmp_types.hrl.
trans-unit.target: 每个函数都使用参数 NameDb （它是一个元组 {Name, Db} ）来标识函数应使用的数据库。 Name 是在MIB中定义的管理对象的符号名称， Db 是 volatile ， persistent 或 mnesia 。如果是 mnesia ，则所有变量都存储在Mnesia表 snmp_variables 中该表必须是具有两个属性的表（不是Mnesia SNMP表）。SNMP表以与SNMP表相同的名称存储在Mnesia表中。所有功能均假定存在具有正确名称和属性的Mnesia表。确保这一点是程序员的责任。具体来说，如果变量存储在Mnesia中，则表 snmp_variables 必须由程序员创建。该表的记录定义在文件 snmp/include/snmp_types.hrl 中定义。

trans-unit.source: Each instance of ErlNifResourceType represents a class of memory-managed resource objects that can be garbage collected. Each resource type has a unique name and a destructor function that is called when objects of its type are released.
trans-unit.target: ErlNifResourceType 的每个实例代表一类可以进行垃圾回收的内存管理资源对象。每种资源类型都有一个唯一的名称和一个析构函数，当释放该类型的对象时会调用该析构函数。

trans-unit.source: Each key part is 64 bits (in CBC mode only 8 bits are used)
trans-unit.target: 每个关键部分都是64位(在CBC模式下只使用8位

trans-unit.source: Each key-value association in the map is called an association pair. The key and value parts of the pair are called elements. The number of association pairs is said to be the size of the map.
trans-unit.target: 映射中的每个键-值关联称为关联对。该对中的键和值部分称为元素。关联对的数量被称为地图的大小。

trans-unit.source: Each list element is copied only once. The growing result Acc is the right operand for the ++ operator, and it is not copied.
trans-unit.target: 每个列表元素仅复制一次。不断增长的结果 Acc 是对右操作数 ++ 运算符，并且它不被复制。

trans-unit.source: Each managed object can exist in many instances within a SNMP entity. To identify the instances, specified by an MIB module, a method to distinguish the actual instance by its 'scope' or context is used. Often the context is a physical or a logical device. It can include multiple devices, a subset of a single device or a subset of multiple devices, but the context is always defined as a subset of a single SNMP entity. To be able to identify a specific item of management information within an SNMP entity, the context, the object type and its instance must be used.
trans-unit.target: 在一个SNMP实体中,每个被管理对象可以存在许多实例。为了识别由MIB模块指定的实例,使用了一种通过 "范围 "或上下文来区分实际实例的方法。通常情况下,上下文是一个物理或逻辑设备。它可以包括多个设备、单个设备的子集或多个设备的子集,但上下文总是被定义为单个SNMP实体的子集。为了能够识别一个SNMP实体中的特定管理信息项目,必须使用上下文、对象类型及其实例。

trans-unit.source: Each match spec in the file ends with a full stop (.) and new (syntactically correct) match specifications can be added to the file manually.
trans-unit.target: 文件中的每个匹配规范都以句号（ . ）结尾，可以将新的（从语法上正确的）匹配规范手动添加到文件中。

trans-unit.source: Each megaco application maintains its own set of counters. So in a large (distributed) MG/MGC it could be necessary to collect the statistics from several nodes (each) running the megaco application (only one of them with the transport).
trans-unit.target: 每个megaco应用程序都维护自己的一套计数器。因此,在一个大型(分布式)MG/MGC中,可能需要从运行megaco应用程序的几个节点(每个节点)收集统计数据(其中只有一个节点有传输功能)。

trans-unit.source: Each module that implements server functionality using the Erlang web server API is to implement the following call back functions:
trans-unit.target: 每个使用Erlang web服务器API实现服务器功能的模块都要实现以下回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Each name in Element_List must be a constructed type except the last name, which can be any type.
trans-unit.target: Element_List 中的每个名称都必须是构造类型，但姓氏除外，后者可以是任何类型。

trans-unit.source: Each normal scheduler has one run queue that it manages. If dirty schedulers schedulers are supported, all dirty CPU schedulers share one run queue, and all dirty IO schedulers share one run queue. That is, we have multiple normal run queues, one dirty CPU run queue and one dirty IO run queue. Work can not migrate between the different types of run queues. Only work in normal run queues can migrate to other normal run queues. This has to be taken into account when evaluating the result.
trans-unit.target: 每个常规调度程序都管理一个运行队列。如果支持脏调度程序调度程序，则所有脏CPU调度程序共享一个运行队列，所有脏IO调度程序共享一个运行队列。也就是说，我们有多个正常运行队列，一个脏CPU运行队列和一个脏IO运行队列。工作无法在不同类型的运行队列之间迁移。仅在正常运行队列中工作的服务器才能迁移到其他正常运行队列。评估结果时必须考虑到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Each of the ... can be a algs_list() as the argument to the preferred_algorithms option.
trans-unit.target: 每个 ... 可以是 algs_list() 作为 preferred_algorithms 选项的参数。

trans-unit.source: Each of the following examples shows a simple system configuration file that configures Logger according to the description.
trans-unit.target: 以下每个示例都显示了一个简单的系统配置文件,根据描述配置记录仪。

trans-unit.source: Each of the following macros takes a single ETERM pointer as an argument. The macros return a non-zero value if the test is true, otherwise 0.
trans-unit.target: 以下每个宏都使用单个 ETERM 指针作为参数。如果测试为真，则宏将返回非零值，否则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Each of the functions described below accept either the module name, the filename, or a binary containing the BEAM module.
trans-unit.target: 下面描述的每个函数都接受模块名、文件名或包含BEAM模块的二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: Each pair of lowercase and uppercase escape sequences partitions the complete set of characters into two disjoint sets. Any given character matches one, and only one, of each pair. The sequences can appear both inside and outside character classes. They each match one character of the appropriate type. If the current matching point is at the end of the subject string, all fail, as there is no character to match.
trans-unit.target: 每一对小写和大写转义序列将完整的字符集分割成两个不相干的集合。任何给定的字符都能匹配每对中的一个,而且只能匹配一个。这些序列可以出现在字符类内部和外部。它们各自匹配一个适当类型的字符。如果当前的匹配点在主题字符串的末尾,所有的匹配都会失败,因为没有字符可匹配。

trans-unit.source: Each predefined analysis is a shorthand for a query, a sentence of a tiny language providing cross reference data as values of predefined variables. The check for calls to undefined functions can thus be stated as a query:
trans-unit.target: 每个预定义的分析都是 query 的简写，这是一种很小的语言的句子，提供了交叉引用数据作为 predefined variables 值。因此，对未定义函数的调用检查可以表示为查询：

trans-unit.source: Each process can only be traced by one tracer. Therefore, attempts to trace an already traced process fail.
trans-unit.target: 每个进程只能由一个跟踪器进行跟踪。因此,试图追踪一个已经被追踪的进程会失败。

trans-unit.source: Each process encodes and decodes their messages. The number of messages processed in total (for all processes) is the mstone value.
trans-unit.target: 每个进程都对其消息进行编码和解码。总共处理的信息数量(对于所有进程)是mstone值。

trans-unit.source: Each process has a trace token, which can be empty or not empty. When not empty, the trace token can be seen as the tuple {Label, Flags, Serial, From}. The trace token is passed invisibly with each message.
trans-unit.target: 每个进程都有一个跟踪令牌，可以为空或不为空。如果不为空，则跟踪令牌可以视为元组 {Label, Flags, Serial, From} 。跟踪令牌随每个消息一起传递。

trans-unit.source: Each process has a current trace token. Initially, the token is empty. When the process sends a message to another process, a copy of the current token is sent "invisibly" along with the message.
trans-unit.target: 每个进程都有一个当前的跟踪标记。最初,标记是空的。当进程向另一个进程发送消息时,当前令牌的副本会和消息一起 "隐形 "发送。

trans-unit.source: Each process has a heap reserved for its use and no references between heaps of different processes are allowed. Messages passed between processes are copied between heaps.
trans-unit.target: 每个进程都有一个保留的堆供其使用,不同进程的堆之间不允许引用。进程间传递的消息在堆间复制。

trans-unit.source: Each process has its own input queue for messages it receives. New messages received are put at the end of the queue. When a process executes a receive, the first message in the queue is matched against the first pattern in the receive. If this matches, the message is removed from the queue and the actions corresponding to the pattern are executed.
trans-unit.target: 每个进程都有自己的输入队列来接收消息。收到的新消息放在队列的末尾。当进程执行 receive ，队列中的第一条消息将与 receive 中的第一条模式相匹配。如果匹配，则从队列中除去该消息，并执行与该模式对应的操作。

trans-unit.source: Each process has its own process dictionary, accessed by calling the following BIFs:
trans-unit.target: 每个进程都有自己的进程字典,通过调用以下BIF来访问。

trans-unit.source: Each release version has a status, which can be unpacked, current, permanent, or old. There is always one latest release, which either has status permanent (normal case) or current (installed, but not yet made permanent). The meaning of the status values are illustrated in the following table:
trans-unit.target: 每个发行版本都有一个状态，可以是 unpacked ， current ， permanent 或 old 。总会有一个最新的发行版，其状态为 permanent （正常情况）或 current （已安装，但尚未永久）。下表说明了状态值的含义：

trans-unit.source: Each request *_REQ is preceded by a 2 byte length field. Thus, the overall request format is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 每个请求 *_REQ 前面都有一个2字节长的字段。因此，总体请求格式如下：

trans-unit.source: Each row defines a manager user of the manager.
trans-unit.target: 每一行定义了管理员的管理员用户。

trans-unit.source: Each row defines a context in the agent. This information is used in the table vacmContextTable in the SNMP-VIEW-BASED-ACM-MIB.
trans-unit.target: 每一行在代理中定义一个上下文。在SNMP-VIEW-BASED-ACM-MIB 的表 vacmContextTable 中使用此信息。

trans-unit.source: Each row specifies which security model to use, along with security level and security parameters.
trans-unit.target: 每一行都指定了要使用的安全模型,以及安全级别和安全参数。

trans-unit.source: Each scheduler thread has its own set of references, and all other threads have a shared set of references. Each set of references consist of 2⁶⁴ - 1 unique references. That is, the total amount of unique references that can be produced on a runtime system instance is (NoSchedulers + 1) × (2⁶⁴ - 1).
trans-unit.target: 每个调度程序线程都有自己的一组引用，所有其他线程都有一组共享的引用。每组引用都由 2⁶⁴ - 1 唯一引用组成。也就是说，在运行时系统实例上可以生成的唯一引用的总数为 (NoSchedulers + 1) × (2⁶⁴ - 1) 。

trans-unit.source: Each schema has a unique cookie, which can be regarded as a unique schema identifier. The cookie must be the same on all nodes where Mnesia is supposed to run. For details, see the User's Guide.
trans-unit.target: 每个模式都有一个独特的cookie,它可以被视为一个独特的模式标识符。在Mnesia应该运行的所有节点上,cookie必须是相同的。详情请看用户指南。

trans-unit.source: Each segment has the following general syntax:
trans-unit.target: 每个部分的一般语法如下:

trans-unit.source: Each segment in a binary can consist of zero or more bits. A segment of type binary must have a size evenly divisible by 8 (or divisible by the unit size, if the unit size has been changed). A segment of type bitstring has no restrictions on the size.
trans-unit.target: 二进制中的每个段可以包含零个或多个位。 binary 类型的段的大小必须被8整除（如果已更改单位大小，则必须被单位大小整除）。位 bitstring 类型的段对大小没有限制。

trans-unit.source: Each segment in a binary can consist of zero or more bits. There are no alignment rules for individual segments of type integer and float. For binaries and bitstrings without size, the unit specifies the alignment. Since the default alignment for the binary type is 8, the size of a binary segment must be a multiple of 8 bits, that is, only whole bytes.
trans-unit.target: 二进制中的每个段可以包含零个或多个位。对于 integer 和 float 类型的各个段，没有对齐规则。对于没有大小的二进制和位串，单位指定对齐方式。由于 binary 类型的默认对齐方式是8，所以二进制段的大小必须是8位的倍数，即只能是整个字节。

trans-unit.source: Each separate (variable) package is generated as a separate file in the same directory as the ReleaseName.tar.gz file.
trans-unit.target: 每个单独的（变量）包都作为单独的文件生成，与 ReleaseName.tar.gz 文件位于同一目录中。

trans-unit.source: Each separate (variable) package is included in the main ReleaseName.tar.gz file. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 每个单独的（变量）包都包含在主 ReleaseName.tar.gz 文件中。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Each signal my be set to one of the following options:
trans-unit.target: 每个信号我都可以设置为以下选项之一:

trans-unit.source: Each sub-agent calls the instrumentation for its loaded MIBs.
trans-unit.target: 每个子代理都会调用其加载的MIB的仪表。

trans-unit.source: Each sub-agent can implement its own mechanisms for set, get and get-next. For example, if the application requires the get mechanism to be asynchronous, or needs a N-phase set mechanism, a specialized sub-agent should be used.
trans-unit.target: 每个子代理都可以实现自己的 set ， get 和 get-next 机制。例如，如果应用程序要求 get 机制是异步的，或者需要N相 set 机制，则应使用专门的子代理。

trans-unit.source: Each tab in the main window contains an information page. If no information is found for an item, the page is empty. The reason for not finding information about an item can be the following:
trans-unit.target: 主窗口的每个标签页都包含一个信息页。如果没有找到某个项目的信息,则该页面为空。找不到项目信息的原因可能是:

trans-unit.source: Each table retains its old contents in a checkpoint retainer. For performance critical applications, it can be important to realize the processing overhead associated with checkpoints. In a worst case scenario, the checkpoint retainer consumes more memory than the table itself. Also, each update becomes slightly slower on those nodes where checkpoint retainers are attached to the tables.
trans-unit.target: 每个表都会在检查点保留器中保留其旧内容。对于性能关键型应用来说,实现与检查点相关的处理开销可能很重要。在最坏的情况下,检查点保留器消耗的内存比表本身还要多。此外,在那些将检查点保留器连接到表的节点上,每次更新都会变得稍慢。

trans-unit.source: Each term Term in the list is called an element. The number of elements is said to be the length of the list.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的每个术语 Term 称为一个元素。元素的数量被称为列表的长度。

trans-unit.source: Each term Term in the tuple is called an element. The number of elements is said to be the size of the tuple.
trans-unit.target: 元组中的每个术语 Term 称为element。元素的数量被称为元组的大小。

trans-unit.source: Each test case is executed by a dedicated Erlang process. The process is spawned when the test case starts, and terminated when the test case is finished. The configuration functions init_per_testcase and end_per_testcase execute on the same process as the test case.
trans-unit.target: 每个测试用例均由专用的Erlang进程执行。当测试用例开始时会产生该过程，而在测试用例完成时会终止该过程。配置函数 init_per_testcase 和 end_per_testcase 在与测试用例相同的过程中执行。

trans-unit.source: Each test suite module can contain the optional configuration functions init_per_suite/1 and end_per_suite/1. If the init function is defined, so must the end function be.
trans-unit.target: 每个测试套件模块都可以包含可选的配置函数 init_per_suite/1 和 end_per_suite/1 。如果定义了init函数，则必须定义end函数。

trans-unit.source: Each test suite module can contain the optional configuration functions init_per_testcase/2 and end_per_testcase/2. If the init function is defined, so must the end function be.
trans-unit.target: 每个测试套件模块都可以包含可选的配置函数 init_per_testcase/2 和 end_per_testcase/2 。如果定义了init函数，则必须定义end函数。

trans-unit.source: Each test suite module must export function all/0, which returns the list of all test case groups and test cases to be executed in that module.
trans-unit.target: 每个测试套件模块必须导出函数 all/0 ，该函数返回所有测试用例组和要在该模块中执行的测试用例的列表。

trans-unit.source: Each time a function in a Cover compiled module is called, information about the call is added to an internal database of Cover. The coverage analysis is performed by examining the contents of the Cover database. The output Answer is determined by two parameters, Level and Analysis.
trans-unit.target: 每次调用Cover编译模块中的函数时，有关该调用的信息都会添加到Cover的内部数据库中。覆盖率分析是通过检查Cover数据库的内容执行的。输出 Answer 由两个参数 Level 和 Analysis 确定。

trans-unit.source: Each time a function in the Cover compiled module channel is called, information about the call will be added to the Cover database. Run the test case:
trans-unit.target: 每次调用Cover编译模块 channel 的函数时，有关该调用的信息将添加到Cover数据库中。运行测试用例：

trans-unit.source: Each tuple contains an atom describing the type of memory as first element and the amount of allocated memory in bytes as second element. When information about allocated and used memory is present, also a third element is present, containing the amount of used memory in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 每个元组都包含一个原子,作为第一元素描述内存的类型,第二元素描述以字节为单位的分配内存量。当有关于分配的和使用的内存的信息时,也有一个第三元素,包含以字节为单位的使用的内存量。

trans-unit.source: Each undecoded part that is to be decoded must be fed into function decode_part/2 as follows:
trans-unit.target: 必须将每个要解码的未解码部分按如下方式馈入函数 decode_part/2 ：

trans-unit.source: Each update is appended to the transaction log and occasionally (depending on how it is configured) dumped to the tables files. The table file storage is more compact than the transaction log storage, especially if the same record is updated repeatedly. If the thresholds for dumping the transaction log are reached before the previous dump is finished, an overload event is triggered.
trans-unit.target: 每次更新都会追加到事务日志中,偶尔(取决于如何配置)会转储到表文件中。表文件的存储比事务日志存储更紧凑,特别是当同一记录被重复更新时。如果在上一次转储完成之前达到了转储事务日志的阈值,就会触发过载事件。

trans-unit.source: Each user is represented by a tuple with the Mid of the user and a list of config parameters (each parameter is in turn a tuple: {Item, Value}).
trans-unit.target: 每个用户都由一个具有该用户的Mid和一个配置参数列表的元组表示（每个参数又是一个元组： {Item, Value} ）。

trans-unit.source: Earlier it was mentioned that a variable can only be given a value once in its scope. In the above you see that Result_so_far is given several values. This is OK since every time you call list_max/2 you create a new scope and one can regard Result_so_far as a different variable in each scope.
trans-unit.target: 前面提到过，在变量范围内只能给变量赋一次值。在上面的代码中，您看到 Result_so_far 得到了几个值。这是可以的，因为每次调用 list_max/2 时,您都会创建一个新的作用域，并且可以将 Result_so_far 视为每个作用域中的不同变量。

trans-unit.source: Earlier version of the release to downgrade to.
trans-unit.target: 早期的版本要降级到。

trans-unit.source: Earlier version of the release to upgrade from.
trans-unit.target: 较早版本的版本升级。

trans-unit.source: Earlier versions of Perl and PCRE used to give an error at compile time for such patterns. However, as there are cases where this can be useful, such patterns are now accepted. However, if any repetition of the subpattern matches no characters, the loop is forcibly broken.
trans-unit.target: 早期版本的Perl和PCRE在编译时对这种模式会给出一个错误。但是,由于在某些情况下这样做是有用的,所以现在这种模式被接受了。但是,如果子模式的任何重复都没有匹配到任何字符,那么循环就会被强行中断。

trans-unit.source: Earlier versions of the ASN.1 compiler required that modules that were imported from had to be compiled before the module that imported. This caused problems when ASN.1 modules had circular dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 早期版本的ASN.1编译器要求,导入的模块必须在导入的模块之前编译。当ASN.1模块有循环依赖关系时,这就会造成问题。

trans-unit.source: Earlier, Fun could also be specified as {Module, Function}, equivalent to apply(Module, Function, Args). This use is deprecated and will stop working in a future release.
trans-unit.target: 之前， Fun 也可以指定为 {Module, Function} ，等效于 apply(Module, Function, Args) 。不建议使用此用法，并且在将来的版本中将停止使用。

trans-unit.source: Easy-to-use timeouts (State Time-Outs, Event Time-Outs and Generic Time-outs (named time-outs))
trans-unit.target: 易于使用的超时（ State Time-Outs 超时， Event Time-Outs 和 Generic Time-outs （称为超时））

trans-unit.source: Edits configuration data.
trans-unit.target: 编辑配置数据。

trans-unit.source: Edits the environment block for the service. Every environment variable specified is added to the system environment block. If a variable specified here has the same name as a system-wide environment variable, the specified value overrides the system-wide. Environment variables are added to this list by specifying <variable>=<value> and deleted from the list by specifying <variable> alone. The environment block is automatically sorted. Any number of -env options can be specified in one command. Default is to use the system environment block unmodified (except for two additions, see section Environment below).
trans-unit.target: 编辑服务的环境块。指定的每个环境变量都将添加到系统环境块中。如果此处指定的变量与系统范围的环境变量具有相同的名称，则指定的值将覆盖系统范围的变量。通过指定<variable> = <value>将环境变量添加到此列表，而通过单独指定<variable>从列表中删除环境变量。环境块将自动排序。一个命令中可以指定任意数量的 -env 选项。默认是使用未修改的系统环境块（除了两个添加项，请参见下面的 Environment 部分）。

trans-unit.source: Efficient code can be well-structured and clean, based on a sound overall architecture and sound algorithms. Efficient code can be highly implementation-code that bypasses documented interfaces and takes advantage of obscure quirks in the current implementation.
trans-unit.target: 高效的代码可以是结构合理、干净利落的,基于完善的整体架构和完善的算法。高效的代码可以是高度实现的代码,绕过文档化的接口,利用当前实现中不明显的怪癖。

trans-unit.source: Efficiently reads the terms that are appended to an internally formatted log. It minimizes disk I/O by reading 64 kilobyte chunks from the file. Functions bchunk/2,3 return the binaries read from the file, they do not call binary_to_term(). Apart from that, they work just like chunk/2,3.
trans-unit.target: 有效地读取附加到内部格式化日志中的术语。通过从文件读取64 KB的块，可最大程度地减少磁盘I / O。函数 bchunk/2,3 返回从文件读取的二进制文件，它们不调用 binary_to_term() 。除此之外，它们的工作方式就像 chunk/2,3 一样。

trans-unit.source: Egyptian_Hieroglyphs
trans-unit.target: Egyptian_Hieroglyphs

trans-unit.source: Either Location is illegal, or it is evaluated to a negative offset in the file. Notice that if the resulting position is a negative value, the result is an error, and after the call the file position is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 无论是 Location 是非法的，或者其被评估为负在文件中的偏移量。请注意，如果结果位置为负值，则结果为错误，并且在调用之后，文件位置未定义。

trans-unit.source: Either a back reference, or the two characters "8" and "1"
trans-unit.target: 要么是回文,要么是 "8 "和 "1 "两个字。

trans-unit.source: Either sends a message and returns ok, or does not send the message but returns something else (see below). Otherwise the same as erlang:send/2. For more detailed explanation and warnings, see erlang:send_nosuspend/2,3.
trans-unit.target: 发送消息并返回 ok ，或者不发送消息但返回其他内容（请参见下文）。否则与 erlang:send/2 相同。有关更多详细的说明和警告，请参阅 erlang:send_nosuspend/2,3 。

trans-unit.source: Either set all or none of the DED_LD* variables.
trans-unit.target: 设置全部或不设置 DED_LD* 变量。

trans-unit.source: Either set all or none of the LFS_* variables.
trans-unit.target: 设置全部或不设置 LFS_* 变量。

trans-unit.source: Either the atom longnames or the atom shortnames indicating whether long or short names is used.
trans-unit.target: 任一原子 longnames 或原子 shortnames 指示长或短的名称是否被使用。

trans-unit.source: Either the exit reason of the process, noproc (process or port did not exist at the time of monitor creation), or noconnection (no connection to the node where the monitored process resides).
trans-unit.target: 任一过程的退出原因， noproc ，或（处理或端口没有在显示器创建时存在） noconnection （至节点，其中被监视的过程所驻留没有连接）。

trans-unit.target: Elbasan

trans-unit.source: Element GroupSpec makes it possible to specify group execution properties that overrides those in the group definition (that is, in groups/0). Execution properties for subgroups might be overridden as well. This feature makes it possible to change properties of groups at the time of execution, without having to edit the test suite. The same feature is available for group elements in the Suite:all/0 list. For details and examples, see section Test Case Groups.
trans-unit.target: 元素 GroupSpec 使得指定覆盖组定义（即 groups/0 ）中的属性的组执行属性成为可能。子组的执行属性也可能会被覆盖。使用此功能，可以在执行时更改组的属性，而无需编辑测试套件。 Suite:all/0 列表中的 group 元素可使用相同的功能。有关详细信息和示例，请参见“ Test Case Groups 部分。

trans-unit.source: Element Location at the end is optional. Omitting it is equivalent to specifying an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 最后的元素 Location 是可选的。忽略它等同于指定一个空列表。

trans-unit.source: Element is any of:
trans-unit.target: 元素是任何一种:

trans-unit.source: Elements from the Config list can, for example, be read with proplists:get_value/2 in STDLIB (or the macro ?config defined in ct.hrl).
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用STDLIB中的 proplists:get_value/2 （或在 ct.hrl 中定义的宏 ?config ）读取 Config 列表中的元素。

trans-unit.target: 元组中的元素

trans-unit.target: Emacs集成

trans-unit.source: Emits warnings for all implicitly exported variables referred to after the primitives where they were first defined. By default, the compiler only emits warnings for exported variables referred to in a pattern.
trans-unit.target: 对在基元首次定义后引用的所有隐式导出变量发出警告。默认情况下,编译器只对模式中引用的导出变量发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Emits warnings for unused imported functions. Default is to emit no warnings for unused imported functions.
trans-unit.target: 对未使用的导入函数发出警告。缺省值是不对未使用的导入函数发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Empty documents are occasionally useful; in particular, they have the property that above(X, empty()) will force a new line after X without leaving an empty line below it; since this is a common idiom, the utility function break/1 will place a given document in such a context.
trans-unit.target: 空文件偶尔会有用。特别是，它们具有以下属性： above(X, empty()) 将在 X 之后强制换行，而不会在其下留空行；由于这是一个常见习语，因此实用程序功能 break/1 会将给定的文档放在这样的上下文中。

trans-unit.source: Emulator flag +fnu is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 模拟器标志 +fnu 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Enable automatic gc of the mib server cache.
trans-unit.target: 启用mib服务器缓存的自动gc。

trans-unit.source: Enable code coverage analysis (similar to ct_run -cover).
trans-unit.target: 启用代码覆盖率分析（类似于 ct_run -cover ）。

trans-unit.source: Enable process tracing for new processes and use dyntrace as tracer backend.
trans-unit.target: 对新进程启用进程跟踪，并将 dyntrace 用作跟踪程序后端。

trans-unit.source: Enable the mib server cache.
trans-unit.target: 启用mib服务器缓存。

trans-unit.source: Enable the process_register LTTng tracepoint for Erlang.
trans-unit.target: 启用Erlang的process_register LTTng tracepoint。

trans-unit.source: Enables (Flag == true) or disables (Flag == false) printout of standard events to the terminal.
trans-unit.target: 启用（ Flag == true ）或禁用（ Flag == false ）将标准事件打印到终端。

trans-unit.source: Enables sys_alloc.
trans-unit.target: 启用 sys_alloc 。

trans-unit.source: Enables SAC delay
trans-unit.target: 启用SAC延迟

trans-unit.source: Enables a table-specific parameterization of a generic hash module. This property can explicitly be set at table creation. Default is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 启用通用哈希模块的表特定的参数化。可以在创建表时显式设置此属性。默认值是 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Enables all allocators (default).
trans-unit.target: 启用所有分配器(默认)。

trans-unit.source: Enables all breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 启用所有断点。

trans-unit.source: Enables allocator <S>.
trans-unit.target: 启用分配器 <S> 。

trans-unit.source: Enables autoload tracing, displaying information while loading code.
trans-unit.target: 启用自动加载跟踪,加载代码时显示信息。

trans-unit.source: Enables automatic timetrap time-out scaling.
trans-unit.target: 启用自动 timetrap time-out 缩放。

trans-unit.source: Enables automatic Path MTU discovery
trans-unit.target: 启用路径MTU自动发现功能。

trans-unit.source: Enables debug output. The more -d flags specified, the more debug output you will get (to a certain limit). This option is most useful when the epmd daemon is not started as a daemon.
trans-unit.target: 启用调试输出。更 -d 标志指定，更多的调试输出你会得到（到一定极限）。当 epmd 守护程序未作为守护程序启动时，此选项最有用。

trans-unit.source: Enables definition of an alternative hashing scheme. The module must implement the mnesia_frag_hash callback behavior. This property can explicitly be set at table creation. Default is mnesia_frag_hash.
trans-unit.target: 启用替代哈希方案的定义。该模块必须实现 mnesia_frag_hash 回调行为。可以在创建表时显式设置此属性。默认值为 mnesia_frag_hash 。

trans-unit.source: Enables fetching of CRLs specified as http URIs inX509 certificate extensions. Requires the OTP inets application.
trans-unit.target: 启用对 X509 certificate extensions 指定为http URI的CRL的提取。需要OTP inets应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Enables heartbeat
trans-unit.target: 启用心脏跳动

trans-unit.source: Enables installation of alternative debug functions. An example of such a function is a trigger, a function that waits for some special event and performs some action when the event is generated. For example, turning on low-level tracing.
trans-unit.target: 允许安装替代性调试函数。这种函数的一个例子是触发器,一个等待一些特殊事件的函数,并在事件产生时执行一些操作。例如,开启低级跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Enables modification of the logging behavior, see Log options.
trans-unit.target: 启用修改日志记录行为，请参阅 Log options 。

trans-unit.source: Enables modified timing and sets the modified timing level. Valid range is 0-9. The timing of the runtime system is changed. A high level usually means a greater change than a low level. Changing the timing can be very useful for finding timing-related bugs.
trans-unit.target: 启用修改后的定时,并设置修改后的定时级别。有效范围为0-9。运行时系统的定时被改变。高电平通常比低电平意味着更大的变化。修改时序对于发现时序相关的错误非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables time correction:
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用 time correction ：

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables scheduler utilization balancing of load. By default scheduler utilization balancing is disabled and instead scheduler compaction of load is enabled, which strives for a load distribution that causes as many scheduler threads as possible to be fully loaded (that is, not run out of work). When scheduler utilization balancing is enabled, the system instead tries to balance scheduler utilization between schedulers. That is, strive for equal scheduler utilization on all schedulers.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用负载的 scheduler utilization 平衡。默认情况下，禁用调度程序利用率平衡，而启用负载的调度程序压缩，这会争取实现负载分配，从而导致尽可能多的调度程序线程被完全加载（即，不会耗尽工作）。启用调度程序利用率平衡后，系统将尝试在调度程序之间平衡调度程序利用率。即，争取在所有调度程序上均等地利用调度程序。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables call tracing for one or more functions. Must be combined with erlang:trace/3 to set the call trace flag for one or more processes.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用一项或多项功能的呼叫跟踪。必须与 erlang:trace/3 组合以设置一个或多个进程的 call 跟踪标志。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables OS signals.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用操作系统信号。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables printout of standard events to a file.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用将标准事件打印到文件的功能。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables scheduler compaction of load. By default scheduler compaction of load is enabled. When enabled, load balancing strives for a load distribution, which causes as many scheduler threads as possible to be fully loaded (that is, not run out of work). This is accomplished by migrating load (for example, runnable processes) into a smaller set of schedulers when schedulers frequently run out of work. When disabled, the frequency with which schedulers run out of work is not taken into account by the load balancing logic.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用调度器压缩负载。默认情况下,调度器压缩负载是启用的。启用后,负载均衡会努力实现负载分配,使尽可能多的调度线程得到充分的负载(即不会耗尽工作)。这是通过在调度器经常耗尽工作时,将负载(例如,可运行的进程)迁移到一组较小的调度器中来实现的。当禁用时,负载平衡逻辑不会考虑调度器运行结束的频率。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the collection of statistics. If Flag is get, the statistical collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用统计信息收集。如果 Flag 为 get ，则返回统计集合。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the logging of all system events in text format to the file. The events are formatted with a function that is defined by the process that generated the event (with a call to handle_debug/4). The file is opened with encoding UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用将所有系统事件以文本格式记录到文件中。使用事件生成过程定义的函数来格式化事件（调用 handle_debug/4 ）。该文件以UTF-8编码打开。

trans-unit.source: Enables saving of abstract structure on file for debugging purpose.
trans-unit.target: 可将抽象结构保存在文件中,以便进行调试。

trans-unit.source: Enables the os_sup service. Needed on Solaris only.
trans-unit.target: 启用 os_sup 服务。仅在Solaris上需要。

trans-unit.source: Enables the TLS/DTLS server to have a local policy for deciding if a session is to be reused or not. Meaningful only if reuse_sessions is set to true. SuggestedSessionId is a binary(), PeerCert is a DER-encoded certificate, Compression is an enumeration integer, and CipherSuite is of type ciphersuite().
trans-unit.target: 使TLS / DTLS服务器具有用于决定是否要重用会话的本地策略。仅当 reuse_sessions 设置为 true 时才有意义。 SuggestedSessionId 是 binary() ， PeerCert 是DER编码的证书， Compression 是一个枚举整数，和 CipherSuite 的类型的 ciphersuite() 。

trans-unit.source: Enables the autoresume feature. When enabled, remote nodes try to reconnect to the controlling node if they are restarted. The feature requires application Runtime_Tools to be started (so it has to be present in the .boot scripts if the traced nodes run with embedded Erlang). If this is not possible, resume can be performed manually by starting Runtime_Tools remotely using rpc:call/4.
trans-unit.target: 启用自动恢复功能。启用后，如果远程节点重新启动，它们将尝试重新连接到控制节点。该功能要求启动应用程序Runtime_Tools（因此，如果跟踪的节点使用嵌入式Erlang运行，则它必须存在于 .boot 脚本中）。如果无法做到这一点，则可以通过使用 rpc:call/4 远程启动 Runtime_Tools 来手动执行恢复。

trans-unit.source: Enables the code path cache of the code server; see code(3).
trans-unit.target: 启用代码服务器的代码路径缓存；参见 code(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Enables time correction. This is the default if time correction is supported on the specific platform.
trans-unit.target: 启用时间校正。如果特定平台上支持时间校正,则为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Enables to efficiently read the terms that are appended to a log. Minimises disk I/O by reading 64 kilobyte chunks from the file.
trans-unit.target: 能够有效地读取附加到日志中的术语。通过从文件中读取64千字节的数据块,使磁盘I/O最小化。

trans-unit.source: Enables tracing for all received messages (to 'receive' traced processes). Any match specification is removed. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 对所有接收到的消息启用跟踪（以 'receive' 跟踪的进程）。删除任何匹配规范。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Enables tracing for all sent messages (from send traced processes). Any match specification is removed. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 启用对所有已发送消息（来自已 send 跟踪进程）的跟踪。删除任何匹配规范。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Enables tracing for the matching functions. Any match specification is removed.
trans-unit.target: 启用匹配函数的跟踪。任何匹配规范都会被删除。

trans-unit.source: Enables verbose output.
trans-unit.target: 启用多字输出。

trans-unit.source: Enables/disables periodic transmission on a connected socket when no other data is exchanged. If the other end does not respond, the connection is considered broken and an error message is sent to the controlling process. Defaults to disabled.
trans-unit.target: 没有其他数据交换时，启用/禁用连接的套接字上的定期传输。如果另一端没有响应，则认为连接已断开，并且将错误消息发送到控制过程。默认为 disabled 。

trans-unit.source: Enables/disables permission to send broadcasts.
trans-unit.target: 启用/禁用发送广播的权限。

trans-unit.source: Enables/disables routing bypass for outgoing messages.
trans-unit.target: 启用/禁用外发信息的路由旁路。

trans-unit.source: Enabling the service includes actions which require root privileges, such as change of ownership and file privileges of an executable binary file, and creating a modified copy of the configuration file for syslogd. When os_sup is terminated, the service must be disabled, meaning the original configuration must be restored. Enabling/disabling can be done either outside or inside os_sup, see Configuration below.
trans-unit.target: 启用服务包括需要root特权的操作，例如更改所有权和可执行二进制文件的文件特权，以及为 syslogd 创建配置文件的修改后的副本。当 os_sup 被终止时，服务必须被禁用，这意味着原始配置必须被恢复。可以在 os_sup 外部或内部进行启用/禁用，请参见下面的 Configuration 。

trans-unit.source: Enclosing mark
trans-unit.target: 包围标记

trans-unit.source: Encode (generate) an SDP construct.
trans-unit.target: 编码(生成)一个SDP结构。
